SA20srabhusu:2004: bahi[r]vihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:2008: sa rātryāḥ paścime yāmelaghu laghveva prativibudhya caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāmāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ (Śbh_Sh: 99)
SA20srabhusu:2013: yathābhūtasyāsya yajjāgarikāyogamārabhya buddhānujñātaṃ jāgarikānuyogaṃ sampādayiṣyāmīti yaśchando,
SA20srabhusu:2032: āvaraṇīyā dharmā ye nivaraṇasthānīyā dharmā nivaraṇāparakāste (Śbh_Sh: 100)
SA20srabhusu:2062: ) kāye vā punaranena styānamiddhādīnavapratisaṃyuktā dharmāḥ śrutā bhavantyadgṛhītā, dhṛtāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2070: ] tān teṣāṃ vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:2077: utpannaṃ ca prativigacchatyevamanena tasmādāvaraṇīyā[d] dharmāccittaṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:2078: tatra niṣadyayā katamebhya āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaḥ [cittaṃ] pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:2081: ] sa utpanne vā kāmacchandaparyavasthāne prativinodanāyānutpanne vā dūrīkaraṇāya,
SA20srabhusu:2095: anyatamānyatamaṃ vā bhadrakaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasi karoti /
SA20srabhusu:2096: ye vā dharmāḥ kāmarāgaprahāṇamevārabhya kāmarāgaprahāṇāyodgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:2112: tāṃ (tān) dharmāṃstathā niṣaṇṇo [a]yoniśo manasi karotyevamasyānutpannaṃ ca kāmacchandaparyavasthānaṃ notpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:2145: sa ityevaṃ rūpamayoniśomanasikāraṃ varjayitvā yoniśo manasi karoti /
SA20srabhusu:2164: anātmasu dharmeṣu sa evaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvan,
SA20srabhusu:2182: tasya ca prahāṇāya dharmā udgṛhītā iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:2184: ye anena vicikitsāmārabhya tasyāśca prahāṇāya dharmā udgṛhītā iti vistareṇa pūrvavadityanena kāmacha(ccha)
SA20srabhusu:2186: tadāhārakebhyaśca dharmebhya āvaraṇīyebhyastenāha caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāmāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:2187: yā caiṣā dharmādhipateyā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittasya pariśodhanā [/
SA20srabhusu:2191: yathāpi tadutpanne anyatamānyatamasminnivaraṇe ātmata eva pratirūpatāmviditvā,
SA20srabhusu:2199: kathaṃ lokamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:2208: sa lokamevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:2217: evaṃ lokamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:2218: śayanāsanapratiguptyarthaṃ punarlokācārañcānuvṛtto bhaviṣyatīti yāvadrātryāḥ prathame yāme caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāmāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:2219: āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhya bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālayati /
SA20srabhusu:2240: tathā hi te sarva eva kusīdā,
SA20srabhusu:2243: api tu dharmataiṣā yaddakṣiṇena pārśvena siṃhopamāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayato na tathā gātrāṇāṃ vikṣepo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:2247: anyathā tu śayyāṃ kalpayato viparyayeṇa sarve doṣā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2252: yadeva manasi kurvan sa prabhā sahagatena cittena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:2253: suptasyāpi cāsya yena na bhavati cetasaḥ [/
SA20srabhusu:2259: yathāsya suptasyāpi ta eva dharmā jāgrato vā abhilapanti,
SA20srabhusu:2267: suptasyāsya tathā smṛtasya yasminsamaye [a]nyatamānyatamenopakleśena cetasaḥ saṃkleśo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:2268: sa utpadyamānameva taṃ saṃkleśaṃ samyageva prajānāti,
SA20srabhusu:2276: sa vīryasaṃpragṛhītaṃ cittaṃ kṛtvā śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:2279: no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ viddhamavakramaṇanimnaṃ cittaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:2297: bhūyasyā mātrayā ārabdhavīryo vihariṣyāmi utthānasampanna iti /
SA20srabhusu:2307: sa rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghveva prativibudhyāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayatīti /
SA20srabhusu:2326: laghu laghvevotthānaṃ bhavatyābhogamātrādeva no saṃgrāmaṃ vā kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaḥ pariśuddhiḥ pūrvavadvedi tavyāḥ (vyā) /
SA20srabhusu:2329: iha jāgarikāyogamanuyuktasya puruṣapudgalasya catvāri samyakkaraṇīyāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:2339: itīmāni catvāri samyakkaraṇīyānyāramya bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ jāgarikānuyogo deśitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2362: yat punarāha rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghveva prativibudhya āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayatītyanena caturthaṃ samyakkaraṇīyamākhyātaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:2375: kathaṃ punaḥ kṛtvā kuśalamālambanaṃ parigṛhya svapiti /
SA20srabhusu:2429: ayamvā me abhisaṃkramaṇakālaḥ ayaṃ nābhisaṃkramaṇakāla iti /
SA20srabhusu:2440: yā ācāreṇākalpena īryāpathena tathā abhikramatīyamasyocyate saṃprajānādvihāritā yadutābhikramapratikramaḥ (mayoḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:2573: yathā ca dhārayitavyaṃ tathā dhārayatīyamasyocyate saṃprajānadvihāritā /
SA20srabhusu:2587: odanakulmāṣamveti yadvā punaranyatamābhisaṃskārikamannaṃ vikṛtaṃ bhojyaṃ prāṇasaṃdhāraṇamidamucyate khāditamaśitamapītaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:2684: yathāpīhaikatyo divā caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāmāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayatyevaṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme,
SA20srabhusu:2693: uddiṣṭeṣu ca dharmeṣu vacasā paricayaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:2703: pratisaṃlīno vā punaḥ bhavatyadhyātmameva cittaṃ sthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:2747: yathāpīhaikatyo yaṃ yameva grāmaṃ vā nigamamvopa[ni]śritya viharati /
SA20srabhusu:2763: ] santi ca punaḥ kulāni yāni mayopasaṃkramitavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:2777: ] tathā copasaṃkramitavyāni yathopasaṃkramannahanna bhrāntena hastinā sārdhaṃ samāgaccheyaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:2798: tatkuta etallabhyaṃ pravrajitena parakuleṣu yaddadatu me pare,
SA20srabhusu:2801: ] upasaṃkramya ca me [mayā] pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā /
SA20srabhusu:2809: ] yāni ca rūpāṇi tatropasaṃkramatā upasaṃkrāntena vā draṣṭavyāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:2811: tatra yāni na draṣṭavyāni teṣu utkṣiptacakṣuṣā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:2822: ] tathā mātṛgrāmo viśeṣeṇa punaḥ śiśurudāravarṇo ra[ñjanī]ya iti yāni ca punā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭāni brahmacaryopaghātibhiḥ brahmacaryāntarāyāya,
SA20srabhusu:2858: upāyāsajātaṃ yanmayā draṣṭavyamityevaṃ rūpāṇi cānyāni caivaṃbhāgīyāni rūpāṇi draṣṭavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:2972: ] te ca punardharmā vacasā suparijitāḥ kartavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2988: rmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayitvā tvakāmena tūṣṇīṃbhāvena ca ye pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā nātitarkayitavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:2991: evaṃ rūpā anena bahavo dharmā udgṛhītā (Śbh_Sh: 128) bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:3160: kālena ca kālaṃ tatpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:3213: pradakṣiṇairnipakasyāṃgasaṃbhāraistāṃ ca punaḥ kathāṃ kālena karoti /
SA20srabhusu:3229: evaṃ ca kālena kālaṃ codako bhavati, smārakaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3233: ] sa cedayaṃ mitrasuhṛdanukampakaḥ ādita eva hitakāmo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3249: saddharma ucyate buddhaiśca buddhaśrāvakaiśca sadbhiḥ samyaggataiḥ satpuruṣairākhyātaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3260: vineyācaritāni cārabhya skandhapratisaṃyuktā vā kathā kṛtā,
SA20srabhusu:3270: ] sā ca kathā saṃgītikāraiḥ parigṛhya śāsanacirasthitaye,
SA20srabhusu:3302: yena dṛṣṭāntena yasya prakṛtasyārthasya vyavadānaṃ bhavatīdamucyate / avadānaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:3306: yadatītamadhvānamupādāya tatra tatra bhagavataḥ cyutyupapādeṣu bodhisattvacaryā duṣkaracaryā /
SA20srabhusu:3323: sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāśca tadanyaprativiśiṣṭāścāścaryādbhutasammatā guṇaviśeṣā ākhyātā ime ucyante adbhutā dharmāḥ //
SA20srabhusu:3367: sā punaḥ cintā dvividhā gaṇanākārāsaha gaṇanāyogena dharmeṇa /
SA20srabhusu:3371: sa cedanyatamānyatamānyatamāṃ pūrvaniviṣṭāṃ deśanāṃ cintayatyābhyāṃ cintayati /
SA20srabhusu:3374: yacca dharmāyatanaparyāpannaṃ rūpaṃ sa ca rūpaskandhaḥ, tisro (Śbh_Sh: 141)
SA20srabhusu:3378_0: ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā vijñānaskandha ityevaṃ gaṇanāsaṃkhyākārāṃ skandha[gaṇanāṃ] cintayatyuttarottaraprabhedena
SA20srabhusu:3378_1: yena vā punarasyāḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanā kārāyāścintāyā apramāṇaḥ praveśanayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3395: yā ca prajñaptyapekṣā sā yuktiryoga (Śbh_Sh: 142) upāyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3398: kāryakāraṇayuktiryā [ta]dutpannānāṃ skandhānāṃ svena hetunā svena pratyaryena tasmiṃstasmin svakāryakaraṇe viniyogastadyathā /
SA20srabhusu:3406: tatra tatra dharmāṇāmanyo [a]nyaṃ kāryakāraṇe pratiyuktiryoga upāya iyamucyate /
SA20srabhusu:3425: tathābhūto lokasanniveśaḥ kena kāraṇena kharalakṣaṇā pṛthivī,
SA20srabhusu:3445: yāvatpunaranyā kāciddeśanā iti yā evamābhyāṃ dvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ gaṇanāsaṃkhyākārā ca yuktyupaparīkṣaṇākārā ca samyagupanidhyāyanā tasyāstasyā deśanāyāiyamucyate /
SA20srabhusu:3497: tatra prayogāntarāyo yenāntarāyeṇa samava[hitena] saṃmukhībhūtenāśakto bhavatyapratibalaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayoge [/
SA20srabhusu:3508: ] na ca lābhī bhavati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāmayamevaṃbhāgīyaḥ prayogāntarāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3549: yaiḥ samavahitaiḥ saṃmukhībhūtairna sukaraṃ bhavatyaraṇyavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasituṃ /
SA20srabhusu:3557: yathāsya pramattasya styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanahati /
SA20srabhusu:3590: te cāsya na kālena kālamavivṛtāni ca sthānāni vivṛṇvanti /
SA20srabhusu:3593: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca prajñayā pratividhya saṃprakāśayanti yāvadeva jñānadarśanasya viśuddhaye /
SA20srabhusu:3601: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇaṃstāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati nottari vyāyacchate /
SA20srabhusu:3612: yena vipaśyanāṃ na pūrayati na viśodhayatyevamasya cāpalyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:3635: tatra ko dadāti [kasmai dadāti kutra dadāti]kena ca dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:3674: āpatsu caivaṃ na parityajanti iti ye vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃbhāgīyā ima upakāriṇaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3682: iti vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃbhāgīyā ima ucyate iṣṭāḥ //
SA20srabhusu:3692: ye vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃ bhāgīyā ima ucyante viśiṣṭāḥ //
SA20srabhusu:3702: idamapi puruṣasaṃkhyātaṃ dānaṃ yatra bodhisattvabodhāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
SA20srabhusu:3771: vinīya sātma[yanmalaṃ] sannidhimalaṃ ca dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:3837: yā, jātusukhayā yayāsyāśitapītakhāditāsvāditā[ni] samyakyukhena paripākaṃ gacchantyevamalpābādho bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3841: nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu dakṣaśca bhavatyanalasa utthānasampannaḥ [/
SA20srabhusu:3855: yāvadbhirguṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyalpecchatāmādiṃ kṛtvā taiḥ parato jñātuṃ na samanveṣate /
SA20srabhusu:3858: alpeccha[ṃ] iti vā evaṃ guṇayukta ityevamalpecho bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3873: na tu pare tadyathā dārakā vā,
SA20srabhusu:3875: ye vā punaranye [a]pi kecidyeṣāmarthāya yā (yā ya)
SA20srabhusu:3901: no tu uccaiḥ śuṇḍāṃ praṇidhāya kulāni upasaṃkrāmati /
SA20srabhusu:3919: yataśca punarjānīte na me ata uttari bhojanena kṛtyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
SA20srabhusu:3928: trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇāmatirekamuttaraṃ na dhārayatyevaṃ trai[cīva]riko bhavati //
SA20srabhusu:3965: śmaśāne vāsaṃ kalpayati yatra mṛtamṛto janakāyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:3988: kenaite dhutaguṇā ucyante tadyathā ūrṇā vā,
SA20srabhusu:3997: ] evameva ihaikatyasya piṇḍapātarāgeṇa piṇḍapāte cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:3998: saṃsaktaṃ cīvararāgeṇa śayanāsanarā[geṇa] śayanāsane cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4001: mṛdukarmaṇyamārjavamāsravamvidheyaṃ yaduta brahmacaryavāsāya tenocyante dhutaguṇā iti //
SA20srabhusu:4017: api ca śmāśānikatvaṃ middhena rāgasya prahāṇāya bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4019: āstaraṇapratyāstaraṇopacchāda[na]rāgasya prahāṇāya yāthāsāṃstariko bhavatyevaṃ dhutaguṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4026: yaduta cīvara piṇḍapāta śayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraistatra pratigra[heṇa] mātrāṃ jānāti /
SA20srabhusu:4034: anyatamānyatamasya vā jñānamātrasya darśanamātrakasparśavihāra sārthakasya lābhī sannetenātmānamutkarṣayati /
SA20srabhusu:4067: yathāpi tanmaitreṇa kāya karmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4095: na sa māropikayā mithyādṛṣṭyā samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4116: sāme tato nidānaṃ bhaviṣyatyanekaparyāyeṇa vyākṣepād vyāpāro vā,
SA20srabhusu:4122: sā (tan) me ato nidānamutpadyate dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:4143: dṛṣṭvā na ca svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyī bhavatyasamaṃjasagrāhī,
SA20srabhusu:4168: śraddhā aśaṭhaḥ alpābādhavīrya prajñā alpecchatā saṃtuṣṭiḥ supoṣatā [//]
SA20srabhusu:4175: laukikaṃ caiva vairāgyaṃ tathā lokottareṇa ca /
SA20srabhusu:4177: tatra kati pudgalā yesyāṃ naiṣkramyabhūmau yathādeśitāyāṃ yathāparikīrttitāyāṃ niṣkrāmanti /
SA20srabhusu:4240: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu rāga āsevito,
SA20srabhusu:4242: bahulīkṛtaḥ sa tena hetunā tena pratyayainaitarhi raṃjanīye vastuni tīvrarāgaśca,
SA20srabhusu:4247: yena pudgalena dveṣaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu āsevito,
SA20srabhusu:4250: tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi dveṣaṇīye vastuni tīvradveṣaśca bhavatyāyatadveṣaśca /
SA20srabhusu:4254: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu moha āsevito,
SA20srabhusu:4258: ] etarhi mohanīye vastuni tīvramohaśca bhavatyāyata mohaścāyamucyate mohonmadaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:4260: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu māna āsevito,
SA20srabhusu:4267: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu vitarka āsevito,
SA20srabhusu:4269: bahulīkṛtastena ca hetunā tena ca pratyayena etarhi vitarka sthānīye vastuni tīvravitarkaśca bhavatyāyatavitarkaśca [/
SA20srabhusu:4283: tena ca pratyayena raṃjanīye vā vastuni,
SA20srabhusu:4295: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu na rāga āsevito bhavati,
SA20srabhusu:4299: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi raṃjanīye vastuni samavahite,
SA20srabhusu:4357: ] sa eva dharmānusārī pudgalo yasmin samaye śrāmaṇyaphalamadhigacchati /
SA20srabhusu:4366: na ca sarveṇa sarvamāsravakṣayamanuprāpnotyayamucyate kāyasākṣī pudgalaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:4379: yasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ pudgalasya anāgāmiphalapratipannakasya kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyadeśāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:4404: ta ime trayo 'ntarābhavaparinirvāyiṇaḥ pudgalāḥ ekatyamabhi saṃkṣipya antarāparinirvāyī pudgala ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:4411: yobhisaṃskāreṇa prayatnena khedamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tatropapannaḥ parinirvātyayamucyate sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pudgalaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:4414: (Śbh_Sh: 182) prathame dhyāne upapannaḥ sa na tatrastha eva parinirvāti /
SA20srabhusu:4426: yaduta etāmeva parihāṇimadhipatiṃ kṛtvā tanmātro vāsya kuśalapakṣo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4427: no tu teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātriṃdivasānāṃ kṣaṇalavamuhūrttānā (ṇā)
SA20srabhusu:4436: no tvaṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasampadya viharati /
SA20srabhusu:4449: samāpattiprabhedena upapattiprabhedena parihāṇi prabhedenā varaṇaprabhedena ca //
SA20srabhusu:4466: iha rāgacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ parītte sarvanihīne raṃjanīye vastuni ghanamadhimātraṃ rāgaparyavasthānamutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:4486: smitapūrvaṃgama ityevaṃbhāgīyāni rāgacāritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:4501: karkaśendriyaḥ paruṣendriyaśca bhavatyatyarthaṃ pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo bhavati /
