SA20srabhusu:6214: asti punaradhicittaṃ śikṣā yā adhiprajñaṃ śikṣāyā āvāhikā,
SA20srabhusu:6215: astyadhiprajñaṃ śikṣā yā adhicittaṃ śikṣāyā āvāhikā /
SA20srabhusu:6221: tataḥ paścādbhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya prayujyamāna[ḥ] smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:6225: adhicittaṃ punaḥ śikṣā adhiprajñāyā āvāhikā pūrvamevoktā //
SA20srabhusu:6231: na tvastyadhiprajñaṃ śikṣā yā vinādhiśīlenādhicittena ca /
SA20srabhusu:6241: tatra sarveṇasarvamavītarāgaḥ satyānyabhisamāgacchan saha satyābhisamayātsrota (-yena strota)
SA20srabhusu:6257: tadyathā śūnyatā [a]praṇihitamānimittemeṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6271: nirvāṇe punaḥ tatra praṇidhānavataḥ praṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6297: ] karmaphale vā prahāṇaprayuktasya ca kāyadauṣṭhulyaśaithilikasya śamathavipaśyanāpakṣālamanasikāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:6324: katame daśa śikṣāpadānāṃ vilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa śikṣānulomikā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:6335: āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā daśavidhasya śikṣāparipanthakasya daśānāṃ śikṣāvilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya samvartante /
SA20srabhusu:6386: prakṛtyaiva vā prahīṇakleśasya kleśapakṣaṃ kāyacittadauṣṭhulyaṃ avigataṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6396: tatra prahīṇatāṃ jñātvā punaḥ punastameva mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:6434: tenaiva teṣāṃ tāvatkālika eva bhraṃśo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6470: api adhvādenteṣu gredhaṃ nigamayamvā varttate (apyadhvānteṣu grāmo nigamo vā vartate)
SA20srabhusu:6476: mupasaṃkramya yoge manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyā[ṃ] praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ /
SA20srabhusu:6477: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ na jānāmītyevaṃ sati yā saṃbhāvanā sā ca hīyenna (hīyeta, na)
SA20srabhusu:6481: sa etamevārthamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā lābhasatkārābhigṛddha ekākī rahogataḥ svayameva cintayitvā,
SA20srabhusu:6484: sa cāsya yogo na sūtre bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6506: te ca tato nidānam pratītā bhaveyurapratītavacanaiśca sāṃ codayeyuḥ /
SA20srabhusu:6512: sa tāmeva lābhasatkārakāmatāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā adharme dharmasaṃjñī,
SA20srabhusu:6520: ayamevaṃ rūpo mithyāpratipattikṛto yogabhraṃśassaddharmapratirūpako hyasaddharmaḥ saddharmasyāntardhānāya [/
SA20srabhusu:6521: ] itīme catvāro yogabhraṃśā dhyāyinā bhikṣuṇā yogācāreṇa parijñeyā varjayitavyāḥ //
SA20srabhusu:6546: yā (yaḥ) sātatyaprayogatāyāṃ satkṛtyaprayo[gatā]yāṃ ca mārgabhāvanāyāṃ spṛhāmutpādayatyabhilāṣaṃ kartukāmatāmityayaṃ caturvidhaśchandaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:6564: evaṃ pratisaṃlayanapraviṣṭasya kālena kālaṃ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayata evamahorātrānuyuktasya caṃkramaniṣadyābhyā[ṃ] nivaraṇebhyaścittaṃ viśodhayataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:6567: ] evaṃ yathāśrutānāṃ dharmāṇāmekākino rahogatasyārthaṃ cintayata ālayadīrghatā tatra /
SA20srabhusu:6609: yo labdhamanaskārasya ca laukikena mārgeṇa gacchato lokottareṇa vā (yo)
SA20srabhusu:6626: tatra prasadanīya yena līnaṃ cittaṃ pragrāhakairnimittairabhipramoca(da)yati /
SA20srabhusu:6632: yamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahīṇā prahīṇatāṃ kleśānāṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhusu:6633: tatrālambanaṃ manasi kurvatā kati nimittāni manasi karttavyāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:6667: tatra layanimittaṃ yenālambananimittena nidānanimittena cittaṃ līnatvāya paraiti /
SA20srabhusu:6675: tāni punarnimittāni yathā samāhitāyāṃ bhūmau ebhirmanaskārairālambanamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:6686: tatra prabhāsvarodhimokṣo ya ālokanimitte sūdgṛhīte ālokasahagataḥ /]
SA20srabhusu:6697: tatra yo mahadgataḥ śraddhācchandasahagato mahadgatamvā ālambanamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:6708: apariśuddho vā punaryo na subhāvito, na (Śbh_Sh 283)
SA20srabhusu:6745: tatra prathamakarmika ekāgratāyāṃ yāvanmanaskāraṃ na prāpnoti /
SA20srabhusu:6748: adhigatepi manaskāre kleśasya cittaṃ vimocayitukāmasya yallakṣaṇapratisaṃvedino manaskārasyārambhaḥ pratigrahaścābhyāsaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:6751: lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedinaṃ manaskāraṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣu ṣaṭsu manaskāreṣu prayoganiṣṭhāpanneṣu kṛtaparicayo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6794: paścātpura imameva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitaṃ ūrdhvaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakātpūrṇaṃ nānāvidhasyāśuceḥ pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhusu:6806: sā khalveṣā traiyadhvikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpannānāṃ vipaśyanākārā pratyavekṣāparidīpitā /
SA20srabhusu:6814: niṣaṇṇo vā nipannaṃ pratyavekṣata ityanena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇātītasya jñeyasya pratyavekṣaṇā paridīpitā /
SA20srabhusu:6819: purato vā gacchantaṃ pratyavekṣata ityanena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇa /
SA20srabhusu:6821: tatra ya utpannotpanno manasikāro [a]nantaraniruddhaḥ sa purato yāyī [/
SA20srabhusu:6826: tatra śamathaṃ ca vipaśyanāṃ ca bhāvayanstadubhayapakṣyāmālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:6903: yā kāyamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā- śrutamayī vā prajñābhāvanāmayī vā [/
SA20srabhusu:6908: ) ye dharmā udgṛhītāsteṣāmeva ca dharmāṇāṃ yorthaḥ (/
SA20srabhusu:6913: sākṣākriyāyāṃ ca yaścetasaḥ asaṃmoṣaḥ sūdgṛhītā vā me te ete dharmā na veti //
SA20srabhusu:6914: sūpalakṣitā vā tatra tatra prajñayā na veti /
SA20srabhusu:6916: tatra tatra vimuktyā na veti rupasthitā bhavatīdaṃ smṛterupasthānaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:6917: api ca smṛtyā rakṣāyai smṛterupasthānaṃ viṣayāsaṃkleśāyālambanopanibaddhāya (nibandhanāya) ca /
SA20srabhusu:6932: kleśaviśodhane vā ebhistribhirākārairyā sūpasthitasmṛtitā idamucyate smṛterupasthānaṃ //
SA20srabhusu:7025: uddhataṃ cittaṃ yadati saṃpragrahādauddhatyaparyavasthitamanubaddhacittaṃ yatpragrahakāle cābhisaṃkṣepakāle copekṣā prāptaṃ [/]
SA20srabhusu:7029: tatra subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ yadasyaiva samādherdīrghakālaparicayānnikāmalābhī bhavatyakṛcchralābhī /
SA20srabhusu:7041: kleśaviśuddhiṃ punarārabhya vihāragatāni ṣaṭ cittāni yāvatsuvimuktaṃ cittaṃ na suvimuktamiti [/]
SA20srabhusu:7042: yatpunaḥ satyadhyātmaṃ nivaraṇe asti me nivaraṇamiti jānāti /
SA20srabhusu:7043: asati nivaraṇe nāsti me nivaraṇamiti jānāti /
SA20srabhusu:7052: saṃyojane nāsti me manaḥ saṃyojanamiti prajānāti /
SA20srabhusu:7057: satyadhyātmaṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃge asti me [smṛti] saṃbodhyaṃgamiti prajānāti /
SA20srabhusu:7075: yadā bahirdhā asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpamālambanīkarotyevaṃ bahirdhākāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
SA20srabhusu:7077: paraktaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpamālambanīkarotyevamadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
SA20srabhusu:7106: anindriyasaṃgṛhītameva rūpamadhyātmamupagatamupādattaṃ rūpamālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati] [/
SA20srabhusu:7112: yatsamāhitabhūmikaṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ rūpamālambanīkarotyevamadhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
SA20srabhusu:7115: paradauṣṭhulyasahagataṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ ca rūpamālambanīkurvan adhyātmabahirdhā kāye /
SA20srabhusu:7122: bāhyaṃ bhūtarūpamālambanī kurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
SA20srabhusu:7126: evaṃ tadupādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmāstepi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7136: samadharmatāṃ ālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharatyevaṃ tadupādāya,
SA20srabhusu:7141: ] ātmanaḥ anta[ḥ] kāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhiḥ ākārairālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati //
SA20srabhusu:7142: pareṣāmantaḥ kāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhirākārairālambanīkurvanbahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharatyadhyātmaṃ cittaṃ ca bahiḥkāyavipariṇataṃ vinīlakādibhirākāraiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7144: vinīlakādibhirākāraistulyadharmatayā ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /
SA20srabhusu:7150: tatra caturṇāmviparyāsānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni /
SA20srabhusu:7151: tatrāśucau śucīti viparyāse pratipakṣeṇa kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7159: yatkiṃcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātyevamasya yo duḥkhasukhe sukhamiti /
SA20srabhusu:7165: manekavidhānāṃ bahunānāprakāratāṃ cittasyopalabhya yaḥ anitye nityamiti viparyāsaḥ [sa] prahīyate /
SA20srabhusu:7167: tasya yeṣāṃ ātmadṛṣṭyādikā[nāṃ] saṃkleśānāṃ sadbhāvādyeṣāṃ nānātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmasadbhāvātskandheṣvātma darśanaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7178: yadāśritaśca sukhaduḥkha ja dharmādharmābhyāṃ saṃkliśyate vyavadā(dī)yate ca /
SA20srabhusu:7202: viśudhyate yataśca yaśca yena saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca /
SA20srabhusu:7214: tatra yā prajñā smṛtiśca samādhisaṃgrāhikā tatsvabhāvasmṛtyupasthānaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7225: sa evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu kṛtaparicaya audāriko(kau)
SA20srabhusu:7230: utpannānāṃ sthitaya iti vistareṇa pūrvavadyāvaccittaṃ pragṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:7240: ] tatra kuśalā dharmā ye tatprātipakṣikā dharmāduścaritaprātipakṣikā,
SA20srabhusu:7243: utpannāśca pāpakā akuśalā dharmāstatra yadā anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya spṛhāmutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:7245: sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā notpādayiṣyāmītyevaṃ chandaṃ janayati /
SA20srabhusu:7253: te punaḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā atītavastvālambanā vā,
SA20srabhusu:7278: evamayamanutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya vyāyacchata ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:7289: santi pāpakā akuśalā dharmā ye saṃkalpavaśe (bale)
SA20srabhusu:7312: teṣāṃ pratilambhāya saṃmukhībhāvāya ca smṛti mutpādayati [/
SA20srabhusu:7317: kṛ(ya)ttu utpannānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye,
SA20srabhusu:7331: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye [c]chandaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7354: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvadutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye /
SA20srabhusu:7372: tadyathā kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ tatraikaṃ samvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ yadutpannānāmpāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya [c]chandaṃ janayatīti vistareṇa /
SA20srabhusu:7376: anutpannaṃ ca yattadasamudācārataḥ prahīṇamevaṃ tadasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ prahātavyamiti kṛtvā /
SA20srabhusu:7380: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādāyeti vistareṇa yāvaccittaṃ pragṛhṇāti,
SA20srabhusu:7396: evamanutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā anurakṣitā bhavantyayaṃ tāvatsamyakprahāṇānāṃ vistaravibhāgaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7411: prāptavyasya vastunaḥ prāptaye pūrvameva spṛhājātena bhavitavyaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:7416: paryavasthānaprahāṇānuśayaprahāṇāya ca ye prātipakṣikā dharmāḥ kuśalāste samudānayitavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7417: taccaitatsarvaṃ caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavatyayaṃ samāsārthaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:7425: madhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhirayaṃ chandasamādhiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7451: tatrālambane vicaratyantasya vālambanasya svabhāvato nidānataḥ pratipakṣataśca /
SA20srabhusu:7471: tadbahulavihāriṇo yā utpadyante cittasyaikāgratāḥ vistareṇa yāvadayaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7480: samādhipramukheṣu dharmeṣvanutpanneṣu te pāpakā akuśalā dharmā dharma mudā haranti /
SA20srabhusu:7488: tadbahulavihārī ca spṛśati] cittasyaikāgratāṃ yena ca nirabhimāno bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7492: tatpratipakṣāśca me samādhipramukhāḥ kuśalā dharmā[ś]ca pratilabdhā,
SA20srabhusu:7496: sa taṃ caturvidhaṃ samādhimadhipatiṃ kṛtvā paryavasthāneṣu dūrīkṛteṣu /
SA20srabhusu:7500: vyāyacchata iti vistareṇa caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:7514: tatra smṛtiryā navākārā navākārāyāścittasthiteḥ śamathapakṣyāyāḥ saṃgrāhikā /
SA20srabhusu:7519: mānasya yaścittābhisaṃskāraḥ śamathavipaśyanānukūlaḥ kāyakarma vākkarma samutthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:7521: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ prahīṇatāmanuśayānāṃ paricchinatti jānāti /
SA20srabhusu:7530: yā ca praśrabdhiryā ca smṛtiryacca saṃprajanyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7564: pareṣāṃ cādhigame śāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca yo [a]bhisaṃpratyayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7570: ye [a]pi te vīryādayaḥ teṣāmapi lokottaradharmotpattaye ādhipatyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7587: sahadharmeṇa kleśaparyavasthānena vā tena sā anavamṛdyetyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:7589: taiḥ sa balairbalavān sarvaṃ mārabalaṃ vijitya prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:7605: tānyatra samyakprahāṇānyabhipretāni tāni hyatyantatāyai pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya samvarttante //
SA20srabhusu:7638: yathā abhimanthana vyāyāma evaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāmāsevanā draṣṭavyā /
SA20srabhusu:7639: yathā adharaṇyā tatprathamata eva ūṣmagataṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7645: yathā dhūmaprādurbhāva evaṃ satyānulomāḥ kṣāntayo draṣṭavyāḥ //
SA20srabhusu:7646: yathāgneḥ patanaṃ nirarcciṣa evaṃ laukikā agradharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7648: ) utpāda evaṃ lokottarā anāsravā dharmā draṣṭavyā (/
SA20srabhusu:7662: tatra yā ca praśrabdhiryaśca samārdhiyā copekṣā itīmāni trīṇi śamathapakṣyāṇi [/
SA20srabhusu:7665: sa tasmin samaye tatprathamato bodhyaṃgalābhācchaikṣo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7669: ] (Śbh_Sh 327) sa teṣāṃ prahāṇāya triskandhamāryāṣṭaṃgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:7679: āryasya śaikṣasya dṛṣṭapadasyāyaṃ mārga iyaṃ pratipadaṣṭābhiraṃgaiḥ saṃgṛhītā(ḥ) //
SA20srabhusu:7684: pratilabhya ca yattasyaiva prajñayā vyavasthānaṃ karoti //
SA20srabhusu:7705: vihāragato vā punaḥ paryeṣiteṣu cīvarādiṣu gate,
SA20srabhusu:7714: te anena pūrvameva manaskāralābhādbodhyaṃgaireva saha labdhā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:7716: kena kāraṇena dīrgha kālaṃ hyetadāryāṇāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānāmiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ kaccidahaṃ tadvāgduścaritasya,
SA20srabhusu:7721: kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ tadanena tasminsamaye pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7731: iti tānyāpakāntāni śīlānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yāvatpravartate /
SA20srabhusu:7732: yacca kāyakarma yaścājīvaḥ tepi samyagvākkarmāntājīvā ityucyante /
SA20srabhusu:7742: yaccatvāri smṛtyupasthānānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā aviparyāyasaṃgṛhītā smṛtiḥ navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā [/
SA20srabhusu:7746: tadetatsarvamabhisamasya āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaścārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7753: tatra yā ca samyaksamṛtiryaśca samyaksamādhisyaṃ śamathaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7759: jñānamātrapratibaddhavastudarśanamārgaḥ jñānotpattimātreṇa kleśān prajahātyanena kāraṇena vākkarmāntājīvā bhāvanāmārge vyavasthāpitāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7760: iti ya evameṣāmanayā ānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ, paricayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7773: api ca pūrvotpannasya mārgasya paścādutpanno mārgaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7779: tadyathā nirvastukānāṃ kleśānāmapāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇātpratipakṣotpādācca srota āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7786: yayā yamādita eva na prayutyata ityādita u[t]trāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7792: api svābhyāsāttasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7797: tasyāsya srota āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:7804: iha pratyāgamajanmikaṃ kleśaṃ prahāya tadā anāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate //
SA20srabhusu:7807: tatpunaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:7820: ayaṃ tveṣāṃ viśeṣo rāgādicaritaḥ prayujyamānaścireṇādhigantā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7824: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṃgāni /
SA20srabhusu:7826: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvāṇi tāni liṃgāni saṃvidyante /
SA20srabhusu:7849: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayituṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7853: tatropapatro jāto bhavatyeḍamūko hastasaṃbādhikaḥ apratibalo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7861: adhimuktisaṃprayogāddhi tamāryā [a]śāṭhyatayā sucintita dharmārthasya niḥkāṃkṣanirvicikitsāprayoganiryāṇatayā yā dṛṣṭiḥ śraddhayā saṃprayuktā /
SA20srabhusu:7862: asmāddharma vinayādasaṃhāryādadhimuktyā ca saṃprayuktā buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:7868: vigatamāyāśāṭhyā ca yā dṛṣṭiḥ yayā ṛjuko bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7889: tatra puṇyasabhāro yenāpyetarhi ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ prādurābhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:7928: yathoktaṃ śramaṇālaṃkāre tairayaṃ prakṛtyaiva samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7929: itīmānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni mandarajaskasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:7955: darśanabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ vijayāttatra tathāgato bodhisattvaścāyatyāṃ bodhāya pratipannāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7962: tatra ye pṛthagjanakalyāṇakā ātmahitāya pratipannā śajjinaḥ (mārgadeśikāḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:7964: aprāptasya prāptaye anadhigatasyādhigamāya āsākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai prayuktā,
SA20srabhusu:7971: tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā yāvadabrahamacārī [brahmacārī] (ri) pratijñaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7972: ayamucyate mārgadūṣī dūṣitonena mārgo bhavati mūlata āditaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7993: tatra saṃjñābrāhmaṇa iti loke nāma bhavati,
SA20srabhusu:8010: tatra tadantaraprahāyī yo laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8046: api ca pravrājayatyātmanaḥ pāpakānakuśalān dharmān sa pravrajita ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8062: yadvā saṃpra [.........................................] jña upāyajña[ḥ] kuśala ityarthaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8067: sa tāvadupāyajñopi sātatikopi kṛtaparicayopi nārādhako bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8079: sātatikaḥ, kṛtaparicayaśca bhavatyevaṃ sa ārādhako bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8110: yena naiva vā śaknoti maraṇadharmatāṃ samatikramitum //
SA20srabhusu:8128: yasya raṃjanīyeṣu rūpeṣu sahagatvarasampraṣṭavyadharmeṣu nimittagrāhitāyāmanuvyaṃjanagrāhitāyāṃ cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:8130: evaṃ bhojaneṣu mātrajñasya viharataḥ praṇīteṣu raseṣu chandarāgamanunayena cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:8131: bhaktavaiṣamye evaṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyo gamananuyuktasya viharataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8137: abhikramapratikramādiṣu śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayoniśo nimittagrāheṇa cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:8172: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni mārakarmāṇi veditavyāni tāni caturṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ //
SA20srabhusu:8222: na lābhasatkārārthamevaṃ ca punarupasaṃkramya kālenāvakāśaṃ kṛtvā,
SA20srabhusu:8230: ityevañca punarāyācitena yoginā yogajñena sa ādikarmikaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:8273: kaccitte ādipariśodhitādbrahmacaryasya bhāvanāyai śīlaṃ ca te saviśuddhaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:8274: dṛṣṭiśca ṛjvī kaccitte āryasatyānāmuddeśavibhaṃgamāramya dharmaḥ śrutaścodgṛhītaśca /
SA20srabhusu:8279: tata uttari caturṣu sthāneṣu caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samanveṣitavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8315: tasya tata uttarakālaṃ kathayā tāvattrīṇi samanveṣitavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:8318: citrairgamakaidhurairvacanapathaiḥsa tasyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ sa cecchrāvakagotro bhavatyatyarthaṃ tayā kathayā prīyate /
SA20srabhusu:8322: mahāyānapratisaṃyuktāyāmvā punaḥ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ yo mahāyānagotraḥ so 'tyarthaṃ prīyate /
SA20srabhusu:8336: sa prasadanīyāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyā matyarthaṃ prasīdati ramate /
SA20srabhusu:8343: nirvedhikāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ nirvāṇapratisaṃyuktāyāṃ nirāmiṣamu[t]trasya saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:8363: tayā ca ceṣṭayā yathāyogaṃ gotramindriyaṃ caritaṃ ca samanveṣitavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:8365: yathāpi sa yogī yogajño lābhī bhavati cetaḥ paryāyajñānasya [/
SA20srabhusu:8368: (Śbh_Sh 358) etāni catvāri sthānānyebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇaissamanveṣya pañcasu sthāneṣu vinayate /
SA20srabhusu:8374: tatra samādhisaṃbhārarakṣopacayaḥ yāvatā śīlasamvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati / tatra
SA20srabhusu:8375: cāpramādavihārī bhavatyapapariṇāya buddhānuśiṣṭasya ca buddhānujñātasya pudgalasya,
SA20srabhusu:8384: yasya yasya saṃbhāraparigṛhītasya dharmapravibhāgasya lābhī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8428: (Śbh_Sh 360) punaraparaṃ ye te ānulomikā jīvitapariṣkārāścī varādayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8436: gaṃbhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya suṣṭhu ca prakāśayanti /
SA20srabhusu:8441: niṣadya yāvatā evaṃ rātryāḥ prathamaṃ yāmaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:8453: kena kāraṇena pañca kāraṇāni samanupaśyan saṃpiṇḍitena kāyena praśrabdhirutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:8459: tathā pare aneneryāpathena niṣaṇṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyarthamabhiprasīdanti buddhaiśca buddhaśrāvakaiścāyaṃ īryāpatho niṣevitaścānujñātaśca [/
SA20srabhusu:8466: tatra ṛjunā kāyena pragṛhītena styānamiddhaṃ cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
SA20srabhusu:8467: niṣkuhakena citte bahirdhā vikṣepo na paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
SA20srabhusu:8474: api ca samādhinimittālambanā pratibhālambanā smṛtiḥ pratimukhe (khī) tyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8482: tatra cittavyapakarṣaḥ yaḥ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ ca manaskāraṃ ca varjayitvā /
SA20srabhusu:8483: samāhitabhūmikaṃ vā samādhisaṃbhāraprāyogikaṃ vā manaskāraṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:8498: gurubhyastāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikanimittaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tadālambanāṃ pravāhayuktāṃ smṛtimanuvarttayati /
SA20srabhusu:8511: tenālambanena satataṃ ca satkṛtya ceyaṃ pravāhayuktatā /
SA20srabhusu:8515: samādhiriti sā khalveṣā ekāgratā śamathapakṣyā vipaśyanāpakṣyā ca /
SA20srabhusu:8532_1: tasminnevālambane pravarddhanayogena prasādayogena sābhinigrahaṃ sūkṣmīkurvan abhisaṃkṣipan saṃsthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:8542: tāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā teṣu nimitteṣu tasya cittasya prasaraṃ na dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:8578: yā cintā [tā]madhipatiṃ kṛtvā cittamādita ālambane sthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:8589: tatra navākārāyāṃ cittasthitau catvāro manaskārā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8606: yaḥ punarevamadhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathasya lābhī vipaśyanāyāṃ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:8607: tasyaita eva catvāro manaskārā vipaśyanāpakṣyā bhavanti //
SA20srabhusu:8626: sā khalveṣā vipaśyanā trimukhī ṣaḍvastuprabhedālambanā veditavyā(ḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:8644: yadā punastīrayitvā upaparīkṣya yathā vyavasthāpitameva pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8696: ) atrātmā, nāstīti kiṃ pratyakṣamupalabhyate na veti,
SA20srabhusu:8724: ] aśubhādhipateyaṃ dharmaṃ śrutamudagṛhītamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇaivamarthapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8730: ] sa evamarthapratisaṃvedī tāmaśubhatāṃ dvayorbhāvayorvyavasthāpitāṃ paśyatyadhyātmambahirdhā ca /
SA20srabhusu:8733: santyasminkāye keśaromāṇi vistareṇa yāvanmastakaṃ mastakaluṃgaṃ praśrāva (prasrāva) iti /
SA20srabhusu:8734: tāṃ punaranekavidhāmantaḥ kāyagatāmaśubhatāṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ saṃgṛhītāmadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8742: yadanena mṛtakuṇapaṃ svayaṃ vā dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8754: tatra nimittamudgṛhya ekāhamṛtaṃ pragaḍitaśoṇitamayaṃ prāptapūyabhāvaṃ vinīlakamityadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8758: saptāhamṛtaṃ saṃjātakṛmi ādhmātaṃ ca vimadrāmakaṃ vyādhmātakamityadhimucyate kākaiḥ kuralai(rai)
SA20srabhusu:8791: api ca dvau śaṃkalikāyānimittagrāhau citrakṛtāyāḥ pāṣāṇa kāṣṭhaśādakṛtāyā vā /
SA20srabhusu:8812: (Śbh_Sh 374) bahirdhā aśubhatāmākārata evaṃ bahirdhā aśubhatāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8815_0: yathā cādhyātmaṃ bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhāvarṇanibhayā apariṇatā yāvadbahirdhā bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhā
SA20srabhusu:8815_1: varṇanibhā vipariṇatā adhyātmikayā aśubhayā varṇanibhā samānadharmatāṃ tulyadharmatāmadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8816: iyamapi me śubhā varṇanibhā evaṃ dharmiṇīti /
SA20srabhusu:8817: ye 'pi kecitsattvā anayā śubhayā varṇanibhayā samanvāgatāsteṣāmapi sāśubhāyāṃ evaṃ dharmiṇī tadyatheyambāhyā //
SA20srabhusu:8822: yathābhūtamaprajānannadhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā śubhāyāṃ varṇanibhāyāṃ saṃrāgamutpādayāmi viparyāsa eva kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8839: yeyamadhyātmaṃ [a]śubhā varṇanibhā seyamvarttamānamadhvānamupādāya yā punariyaṃ bahirdhā aśubhā varṇanibhā iyamapi vartamāna (tā)
SA20srabhusu:8843: saiṣā tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya śubhā satī tadyathā me etarhi /
SA20srabhusu:8846: sā me iyaṃ [a]śubhā varṇanibhā varttamānamadhvānamupādāyāśubhā satī /
SA20srabhusu:8850: iti hyatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ayamapi me kāya evaṃbhāvī,
SA20srabhusu:8852: etāṃ ca dharmatāmanatīta ityevaṃ kālaṃ samanveṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8857: bahirdhāvopalabhya[mānaḥ] yaḥ śubho vā syādaśubho vā [/
SA20srabhusu:8858: ] (Śbh_Sh 376) api ca rūpamātrametatkaṇḍavaramātrametadyatreyaṃ saṃjñā samājñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8859: śubhamiti vā aśubhamiti vā / api ca-
SA20srabhusu:8863: tasyāsya mṛtasya kālagatasyānupūrveṇa vipariṇatā imā avasthāḥ prajñāyante /
SA20srabhusu:8864: yaduta vinīlakamitivā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikāyā vā ayamapi me kāyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8869: yena nidānena iyaṃ tāvatkālikī śubhā varṇanibhā /
SA20srabhusu:8871: antaḥkāyaḥ punarnityaṃ nityakālamadhyātmaṃ ca bahirdhā cāśubhā evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthanidānataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8878: aśubhā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya samvarttata ityayaṃ tāvanme āptāgamaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8897: maitryadhipateyaṃ dharmamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā hitasukhādhyāśayagatasya sarveṣu sukhopasaṃhārādhimokṣalakṣaṇā maitrītyetamarthapratisamvedyarthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8900: mitrapakṣaṃ vā adhyātmamamitrodāsīnapakṣaṃ bahirdhā evaṃ ca vastuni maitrīṃ samanveṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8902: ya ete trayaḥ pakṣāḥ aduḥkhā sukha(tā)ḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8913: ] evaṃ saprītikena niṣprītikena ca sukhena veditavyam /
SA20srabhusu:8941: śabdamātra[ṃ] māṣamātrametadapi ca tathā saṃbhūtoyaṃ kāyo rūpī audārikaścāturmahābhūtiko yatra me sthitasyeme evaṃ rūpāḥ sparśāḥ krāmanti /
SA20srabhusu:8944: anitya, etepi sparśā ye te apakārakāstepyanityāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8946: sarva eva sattvā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇadharmāṇaste prakṛtyaiva duḥkhitā stan me pratirūpaṃ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:8947: yadyahaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhiteṣu sattveṣu bhūyo duḥkhopasaṃhārameva kuryāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:8952: yonena dīrghasyādhvanotyayānmātā vā bhū[t] pitā vā,
SA20srabhusu:8974: yo me pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu vyāpādaḥ maraṇa eṣa dharma iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:8976: raṇa eṣa dharma iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:8981: ye tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya sukhakāmāḥ sattvāḥ te atītāḥ,
SA20srabhusu:8989: sattvo vā ya eṣa sukhakāmo vā syāt /
SA20srabhusu:8991: api tu skandhamātrametat saṃskāramātrakametadyatraiṣā saṃjñā saṃjñaptirvyavahāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8992: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ karmakleśahetukā ityevamapekṣāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8993: prasiddhadharmatā khalveṣā [a]cintyadharmatā yanmaitrīvyāpādabhāvanā prahāṇāya samvarttata ityevaṃ dharmatāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8995: tatra kathamidaṃ pratyayatā pratītyasamutpādālambanā vipaśyanāprayuktārthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8996: tadadhipateyaṃ dharmamadhimatiṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādātte te dharmā utpadyante,
SA20srabhusu:8997: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhātte te dharmā nirudhyante [/
SA20srabhusu:9009: pūrvānte ajñānamiti vistareṇa yathā pratītyasamutpādavibhaṃge evaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate [/
SA20srabhusu:9012: evaṃ pratītyasamutpannāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarva ete abhūtvā bhāvād, bhūtvā (Śbh_Sh 383)
SA20srabhusu:9017: yo (ya) eṣvanityeṣu duḥkhaśūnyānātmakeṣu saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaṃ pratisammohaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9025: yaḥ karttā vā pratisaṃvedako vā syānnānyatra dharmasaṃketāt /
SA20srabhusu:9027: saṃskāreṣu yāvajjātipratyaye jarāmaraṇe saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ kārako vedaka ityevaṃ nāmā,
SA20srabhusu:9051: yadbalena yatsāṃmukhyena tatkarma vipākadānadāna samarthaṃ bhavatyayamabhinirvṛttihetuḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9052: imaṃ ca dvividhaṃ hetumadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ asya trividhaḥ duḥkhatānupakṣasya kevalasyāsya duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatīti /
SA20srabhusu:9072: iti yaḥ piṇḍasaṃjñino dhātunānātvaṃ ajānānasyā[ne]na kāyena nānādhātukena unnatirmanya (nvā)
SA20srabhusu:9073: nā maraṇa eṣa dharmaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣyaḥ viparyayācchuklapakṣya ityeva[ṃ] pakṣaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:9077: kāṣṭhamvā cākāśaṃ parivāritamagāro [a]gāra iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyevameva ṣaḍdhātūnupādāya /
SA20srabhusu:9080: śoṇitaṃ cākāśe parivārite saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāro bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9086: āptāgamopyeṣa pratyātmajñānamanumānikopyeṣa vidhiḥ prasiddhadharmatācintyadharmatetyevaṃ kāryakāraṇayuktimupapattisānayuktiṃ dharmatāyuktiṃ ca paryeṣate //
SA20srabhusu:9101: ) jīvitendriyamayaṃ ca kāyaḥ savijñānaka ityanityā āśvāsapraśvāsā mahāśravaṇetyevaṃ (ṇā ityevaṃ)
SA20srabhusu:9109: nānyatra kaścidya āśvasiti praśvasiti vā asya caite āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9128: ca nava vidhaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhīto yoginā veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9138: anayā navavidhayā śuklapakṣasaṃgṛhītayā tvaritatvaritaṃ cittaṃ samādhīyate /
SA20srabhusu:9140: yāvatī cānena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghu laghvevāgantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9149: samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaskaḥ punaḥ yatrālambane priyārohatā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9153: abhyāso 'nena kṛto bhavati yo antataḥ parītto 'pi na (Śbh_Sh 390)
SA20srabhusu:9155: tathā hyādikarmikasyānurūpe 'pyālambane na prayuktasya nivāraṇāni nābhīkṣṇaṃ samudācarita(ranti) /
SA20srabhusu:9166: sāmīcīkarmaṇo vā anyasyaivaṃbhāgīyasyetikaraṇaṃ yasyārthāya sa tannimnena cetasā tatpravaṇena tatprāstāreṇa (bhāreṇa)
SA20srabhusu:9171: niyamya pratisaṃlayanāya sa cedbhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsaka kṣatriyabrāhmaṇaparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchati /
SA20srabhusu:9179: bahavo me pratyayā maraṇasya- vāto vā me kupyeta,
SA20srabhusu:9187: na- karotyapramattaśca viharatyevaṃ ca punarapramatto vihara[ti /
SA20srabhusu:9188: ] api bata jīveyaṃ saptāhaṃ ṣaṭ pañcacatustridvire (dvaye)
SA20srabhusu:9193: yāvacca jīveyaṃ tāvadyogamanasikāreṇa śāstuḥ śāsane yogamāpadyeyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9194: ya i(di)yatā mayā bahukṛtyaṃ syādyaduta śāstuḥ śāsane itīyamaśithilaprayogatā /
SA20srabhusu:9220: uddhate citte ūrdhvamvābhiśaṃkini śamathasya kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:9221: tathā vipaśyanāparibhāvite citte iti karaṇīyavyākṣepopahate śamathakālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:9224: tatrālambananimittaṃ vipaśyanānimittaṃ [śamatha]pakṣyaṃ jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbamālambananimittaṃ yenālambanena prajñāṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20srabhusu:9225: tatra nidānanimittaṃ vipaśyanāparibhāvite cetasi uttaratra vipaśyanāpariśuddhaye cetaḥ śamathabimbayogaḥ [/]
SA20srabhusu:9226: tatra vipaśyanākālaḥ śamathaparibhāvite cetasi ādita eva cājñeyavastuyathābhūtāvabodhāya vipaśyanāyāḥ kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:9230: ] tatra pragrahanimittaṃ yena ca prasadanīyenālambanena nimittena cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:9231: yasya vīryārambhaḥ tadānulomikastatra pragrahakālaḥ līnaṃ cittaṃ līnatvābhiśaṃkini pragrahasya kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:9263: na ca śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nimittagrāhī bhavatyanuvyaṃjanagrāhī,
SA20srabhusu:9284: tatra navākāracittasthityā vipaśyanā pūrvaṃgamayā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9293: vyāpya tadālambanaṃ vibhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitamasmiṃstvarthe adhyātmaṃ nimittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9306: tathā prayukta utpannotpanneṣu sarvabāhyanimitteṣu asmṛtyamanasikāraṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9337: tadyathā citrakaraścitrakarāntevāsī vā tatprathamaścitrakarmaṇi prayuktaḥ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:9338: sa ācāryasyāntikācchikṣāpūrvagamaṃ rūpakamādāya dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭavā pratirūpakaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9342: ya yathā yathā bhaṅktyā bhaṅktyā karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9343: tathā tathāsyottaraṃ rūpakaṃ pariśuddhataraṃ paryavadātataraṃ khyāti /
SA20srabhusu:9348: na janvandhasya tadrūpakapariśuddhiṃ nigacchedevamihāpi nayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9367: saiṣā navavidhā śuklapakṣyā śamathavipaśyanānulomā prayogatā veditavyā /
SA20srabhusu:9372: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ samyakprayukto yogī āvaraṇe svañcittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:9382: tatra paritamanā yā naiṣkramyaprāvivekyaprayuktasya kliṣṭā utkaṇṭhā, aratiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9415: asminnāvaraṇe sati saṃvidyamāne caturvidhepyanadhigataṃ nādhigatāt parihīyate /
SA20srabhusu:9440: yena me etarhi vivekaprayuktasya paritamanā utpadyate [/
SA20srabhusu:9453: aparivarjanācca punarasya parivarjanīyasya ko doṣa ityata ādīnavaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:9454: parivarjitasya cāyatyāṃ kathamanutpādo bhavatītyataḥ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamanenāvaraṇebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9457: yaduta ebhireva tribhirmukhaiḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vastūnāmekaikaśyā (syā a)
SA20srabhusu:9459: yathā ca yathā vipaśyanā samyakprayuktasya pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ (vipulatāṃ)
SA20srabhusu:9467: yathā cittaikāgratā vivardhate tathā tathā kāyaḥ praśrabhyate,
SA20srabhusu:9469: ityetau dvau dharmāvanyonyaṃ nirvṛtāvanyonyaṃ pratibaddhoyaduta cittaikāgratā,
SA20srabhusu:9473: (Śbh_Sh 403) peyālaṃ ataścāsya yoginaḥ aśubhāprayogasyāsevanānvayāt bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayāccarato vā,
SA20srabhusu:9476: yathāpi tatsubhāvitatvādaśubhāyāḥ kāmarāgasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ [na] praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:9491: vyāpādasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9495: na nityasukhasattvāya dṛṣṭisahagataṃ sammohanimittaṃ mohaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20srabhusu:9500: ttasaṃjñā, mānaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9504: na tveva prapañcasaṃjñā vitarkaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9520: yathaiva śamathamāsate [te] nocyate śamathaścāsyavipaśyanā cobhe mitrībhūte samayugamvarttete /
SA20srabhusu:9529: samyak prayogatā caiva navādhārā dvidhā matā /
SA20srabhusu:9533: ] āhādikarmikastatprathamakarmika evaṃ vyāpini lakṣaṇe vyavasthāpite ekāgratāyāmā (ā)
SA20srabhusu:9536: sa tatprathamata ekāgratāṃ prahāṇābhiratiṃ cādhigamiṣyāmīti caturbhirmanaskāraiḥ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:9544: saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyayaṃ cittasantāpano manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9550: yenāyaṃ manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittaṃ samvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvejayitvā (saṃvejya)
SA20srabhusu:9553: nirvikalpakatāyāmevaṃ sthāpayatyekāgrāṃ smṛtiṃ pravarttayati yenāsya hetunā, (Śbh_Sh 407)
SA20srabhusu:9557: yena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittena tathādhyātmaṃ saṃśayamiti (saṃśamayati)
SA20srabhusu:9558: tena punaḥ punarabhīkṣṇaṃ adhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9561: katamaḥ kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyevamasya taccittaṃ taptaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9569: vartamāne samavahite saṃmukhībhūte yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9572: abhyatīte kṣaṇe niruddhe vigate vipariṇate yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ (Śbh_Sh 408)
SA20srabhusu:9586: sa evaṃ ratnānyanusaraṃścittamabhipramodayati lābhā me sulabdhāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9591: yasya me sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śīlavanto guṇavantaḥ peśalāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9599: lābhā me sulabdhā[ḥ] so [a]haṃ śāstari tathāgate [a]rhati samyaksaṃbuddhe,
SA20srabhusu:9623: api ca / yadanena pūrveṇāparamārabdhavīryeṇa viharatā viśeṣādhigamaḥ kṛto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9635: yaduta saṃvegapraharṣābhyāṃ yataścittamevaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣa vimukhaṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:9637: abhiṣyandanīyena manaskāreṇa kālena kālamadhyātmaṃ ca pradadhāti /
SA20srabhusu:9638: yaduta cetaḥśamathena praśrabdhijanakena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinoti /
SA20srabhusu:9650: karmā[rā]ntevāsinā vā kālena kālaṃ yadā saṃtāpitaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9654: karmā[rā]ntevāsī vā tadupamena śilpajñānena karmāntavastunā yatreṣṭā(ma)
SA20srabhusu:9656: meva yoginā yadā taccittamabhidhyādimalakaṣāye vimukhībhāvenodvejitaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9659: śamathapakṣe vā vipaśyanāpakṣe vā tatra tatra sūpaśliṣṭaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9674: ] sa cetsa yogaprayukta ādikarmiko rāgacarito bhavatyaśubhāvineyaḥ kathaṃ sa pañcānāṃ nimittānāmudgrahaṇāyā[va]bodhyate /
SA20srabhusu:9700: sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā caivaṃ cittaṃ saṃvejaya /
SA20srabhusu:9702: kṛcchra ātmabhāvapratilabdho yatremā evaṃ rūpātmamaśca (rūpā ātmanaśca)
SA20srabhusu:9710: dṛṣṭivipattirapi yato nidānaṃ sattvā dṛṣṭe ca dharme duḥkhavihāriṇo bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:9729: kaṭukamanālāpamalabhyametatsthānaṃ tasmādetatsarvārthamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahāṇaratiratena me bhavitavyamapramattena,
SA20srabhusu:9730: evaṃ bahulavihāriṇo me apyevāsyānarthasyākriyā syādityevaṃ yoniśaḥ pradadhatsva,
SA20srabhusu:9740: śikṣā[ṃ] yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtyādhyāśayena ca punarakaraṇāya cittamutpāditaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9757: sa cet punarbhavasi pūrveṇāparaṃ parīttasyāpi viśeṣādhigame prītirjanayitavyā,
SA20srabhusu:9765: sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati pūrveṇāparaṃ paracittasyāpi viśeṣādhigamasya [/
SA20srabhusu:9766: ] sa tvaṃ tamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pareṣāṃ ca paripūrṇe viśeṣādhigame yaduta tathāgate,
SA20srabhusu:9828: niṣadya tatprathamata ekāgratāyāṃ cittāvikṣepe smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kuru,
SA20srabhusu:9831: tatra ca te vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavatu /
SA20srabhusu:9832: yena vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānena tathā tathā nimittavitarkopakleśeṣu vikṣepañca parijānīṣva,
SA20srabhusu:9835: tathā tathāvahito bhava yathā te ekāgratopanibaddhā,
SA20srabhusu:9843: yaduta pūrvadṛṣṭamevamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ tadālambanama[nu]smṛtyamanasikāreṇa vibhāvitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9859: pariharttavyamayaṃ ca te utkṣiptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9860: sa cettvamasmāttailapātrādekabindumapi pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyasi tataste utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣa ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:9861_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ api nu sa puruṣaḥ amanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā
SA20srabhusu:9864: tatkasya hetostathā hi tena puruṣeṇo[tkṣi]ptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9867: ato me utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣaḥ ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:9870: tadeva tailapātraṃ sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya samyageva pariharedevameva bhikṣavaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9886: cittasantatiṃ cittadhārāṃ nirmimittāṃ nirvikalpāmupaśāntāṃ vīryabalena nirantarāṃ paurvāpayeṇa pravarttayati /
SA20srabhusu:9891: evaṃ śamathamārgaprayuktasya evamupāyaparigṛhītaṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyasahagataṃ sābhirāmaṃ cittaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9893: sa cetpunaranabhyāsamoṣānna ramate sopāyaṃ ca tadālamba tasmānnirvikalpādālambanād vyutthāya savikalpa ālambane smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kurute /
SA20srabhusu:9894: yadeva te pūrvodgṛhītamaśubhanimittaṃ tadeva manasi kuru tatprathamato nimittamātrānusāriṇyā vipaśyanayā yaduta vinīlakamvā,
SA20srabhusu:9912: ] yathāvinīlakānāmevaṃ yāvada sthiśaṃkalikānāṃ sarvamevamadhimuktimanaskāraṃ niśritya bhūtamanaskāramavatara,
SA20srabhusu:9914: yāvantyetāni vinīlakāni mayādhimuktāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā ato [a]pramāṇavarāṇi me pūrvāntabhārabhya,
SA20srabhusu:9920: tāḥ sa cetkaścit saṃharet saṃhṛtāśca na vinaśyeyuḥ,
SA20srabhusu:9922: nāsti sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra teṣāmavakāśaḥ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:9931: na caitāni vinīlakāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā [yā] vipaśyanāprayuktena sakṛdvipaśyitavyā[ni],
SA20srabhusu:9932: nānyatraikaṃ vinīlakamadhimucya punaścittaṃ śamayitavyaṃ tāvacca tadvinīkamadhimoktavyaḥ (vyaṃ)
SA20srabhusu:9937: śamayitavyaṃ yathā vinīlakamevaṃ yāvadasthiśaṃkalikaikā evaṃ yāvadapramāṇā anenaiva nayena veditavyā[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:9939: vimoktavyāstataḥ sarvapaścādapramāṇāni vinīlakānyapramāṇā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepeṇa vibhāvayatyanābhāsagatāyāṃ sthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:9951: evaṃ ca te śamathavipaśyanāmārge ālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9952: sa ce dādita eva avispaṣṭodhivimokṣo bhaviṣyatyālambane samya[gā]bhāsaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9959: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā vispaṣṭataratāṃ pracurābhāsataratāñca gamiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:9965: sūdgṛhītena kālamadhyātmaṃ cittaṃ saṃśayamayankālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinvanti(cinvan)
SA20srabhusu:9971: , idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmaṃ kāyena kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ yadutātmano 'ntaḥ kāyamārabhya,
SA20srabhusu:9972: sa tvaṃ punarapi bahirdhā aśubhānimittenodgṛhītena vinīlakaṃ cādhimucyasva,
SA20srabhusu:9979: sa tvaṃ punarapyātmanaḥ antaḥkāye 'śubhatāparibhāvitena cetasāścāśubhatāparibhāvitena cetasā parakāye cāntarbahiścāśubhatāparibhāvitena cetasātmānaṃ ghri(mri)
SA20srabhusu:9986: idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ sa[t]tvaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:9987: punarapi catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ śrutacintādhipateyena parikalpanimittagrāheṇa triṣu bhāgeṣvadhimucyasva śamathapakṣye,
SA20srabhusu:9998: kṣīṇā, ye caitarhi smṛtisaṃpramoṣāccittakṣepe satyutpadyante nimittavitarkopakleśālambanādhipateyā vedanādayaścatvāro [a]rūpiṇaḥ skandhāsteṣāmā(yā)
SA20srabhusu:10004: punarapi vipaśyanānimittamudgṛhya sanimitte saṃkalpe manaskāre sthitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10006: vedanādayacatvāro [a]rūpiṇaḥ skandhāsteṣāṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ navanavatāṃ niṣpurāṇatāmanyo 'nyatāṃ pūrvavadadhimucyasva /
SA20srabhusu:10010: evaṃ hi tvamaśubhāprayogamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā catvāri smṛtyupasthānānyavatīrṇo bhaviṣyasi /
SA20srabhusu:10014: sa tvamevamupasthitayā smṛtyā caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yaṃ yameva grāmaṃ vā,
SA20srabhusu:10016: sa tvaṃ tameva grāmaṃ vā, nigamaṃ vā /
SA20srabhusu:10025: yeṣu ca te viṣayanimitteṣvindriyāṇi prerayitavyāni teṣvanābhogatayā asaṃvṛtānīndriyāṇi bhavantu /
SA20srabhusu:10039: adharmyā ca te [tvayā] kathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayitavyā /
SA20srabhusu:10040: dharmyāmapi te [tvayā] kathā[ṃ] kathayatā na vigṛhya kathā karaṇīyā /
SA20srabhusu:10042: ] vigṛhya kathāsaṃrambhānuyogamanuyuktasya puruṣapudgalasya viharataḥ kathābāhulye cittaṃ santiṣṭhate /
SA20srabhusu:10045: na tvamevaṃcārī tvaritatvaritamanutsṛṣṭenālambanena me [a]dyaśamathavipaśyanāyāṃ yathodgṛhītenaiva nimittena pratanukāritayāvā,
SA20srabhusu:10050: sa cedyāvadāyurjambūdvīpe sarveṣāṃ jaṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmabhūttatsarvamabhisamastaṃ mamaikasyaitarhi (Śbh_Sh 426) syāt /
SA20srabhusu:10051: so [a]haṃ tāvadapramāṇenāyuṣā pramāṇayogaprayogeṇa ca sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogatayā pratatakārī bhavā[mi] [/
SA20srabhusu:10053: sa cedyāvadāyurjabūdvīpe manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ na riṃcayaṃ(yan)
SA20srabhusu:10054: yadutāsyaiva yogaprayogasya mahāphalatāṃ mahānuśaṃsatāṃ ca viditvā prāgevāsmin pari(praṇi)dhatte [/
SA20srabhusu:10057: evaṃ hi tvaṃ yathānuśiṣṭaḥ pratatakārī vātyantakārī ca /
SA20srabhusu:10060: mṛdukāṃ kāyapraśrabdhiṃ cittaikāgratāṃ tataścottari vipulālaukikalokottarāṃ sampadamārāgayiṣyati(si) /
SA20srabhusu:10066: tathā maitryavineyādayo [a]pi ānāpānasmṛtiparyavasānāya yathāyogaṃ veditavyāstatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10070: nimittamudgṛhya pratirūpaśayanāsanagato hi sukhādhyāśayagatena manaskāreṇa samāhitabhūmikena pūrvamekaṃ mitramadhimoktavyamekamamitramekamu(ka u)
SA20srabhusu:10072: , teṣu ca tri[ṣu] pakṣeṣu tulyaṃ hitasukhādhyāśayagatena manaskāreṇopasaṃhāraśca karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10084: nirantarā yatra nāstyantaramantato daṇḍakoṭīviṣkambhanamātramapi yathā mitrapakṣeṇaivamamitrodāsīnapakṣeṇa veditavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:10085: sa ca maitrīprayogaṃ ca na jahāti /
SA20srabhusu:10094: yathā me te [a]pi sukhakāmāḥ duḥkhapratikūlā idamasya bahirdhā kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ [sattvaṃ],
SA20srabhusu:10097: eṣāṃ sattvānāṃ mayābhihitasukhopasaṃhārakaraṇāya itīdamasyādhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ [sattvam] /
SA20srabhusu:10108: ato [a]pramāṇatarāḥ sattvā ye mamapūrvāntamārabhya mitrāmitrodāsīnapakṣatayā [a]bhyatītā ye mama mitratāṃ gatvā amitratāmupagatā,
SA20srabhusu:10115: satyāṃ saṃsṛtau saṃsāre yepi ca mayā sattvāḥ pūrvāntamārabhya tanmaitreṇa cittenānukampitāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10116: kiṃ (Śbh_Sh 429) cāpi te [a]bhyatītā apitu tānetarhyanukampe yaduta cittaniṣkāluṣya(kaluṣa)
SA20srabhusu:10120: , ye, [a]pi ca na bhūtā anāgate [a]dhvani sukhitā bhavantu /
SA20srabhusu:10121: evaṃ bhūtamanaskārānupratiṣṭhasya maitrīvihāriṇaḥ yaḥ puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10128: tatredaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpāda ādikarmikaḥ śrutacintādhipateyena parikalpitaṃ na nimittamudgṛhṇātyanyeṣāṃ sattvānāmajñānaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:10129: sammoho yeneme pratyakṣamanityaṃ nityato [a]vagacchanti pratyakṣamaśuci śucitaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:10132: viparyastā ete sattvā viparyāsa hetordṛṣṭe dharme,
SA20srabhusu:10135: tṛṣitāśca jātimūlakāni karmāṇi kṛtvā evamāyatyāṃ karmakleśahetu [............] kevalaṃ saṃduḥkhamabhinirvartayantyevaṃ nimittamudgṛhyādhyātmamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:10136: ayamapi kevalo duḥkhaskandha evameva saṃbhūta iti /
SA20srabhusu:10137: ye cātmabhāvā nānantā[ḥ] paryantāḥ pūrvāntamārabhya yeṣāmādireva na prajñāyate /
SA20srabhusu:10139: eṣāmapi sattvānāmatītānāgatapratyutpannāḥ sarva evātmabhāvā duḥkhaskandhasaṃgṛhītā evamevābhinirvṛttāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10143: yadi na punarātmano vartamānān skandhān pratītyasamutpannān manasikaroti /
SA20srabhusu:10145: yadā ca punaḥ pareṣāṃ vartamānānskandhān pratītyasamutpannānmanasi karoti /
SA20srabhusu:10157: udārāgnisaṃpratāpitebhyo vā praśrayebhyaśca no bahirdhā vāyuskandhātpūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarebhyo vāyubhyo yāvadvāyumaṇḍalebhyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10167: na ca tajjo manaskāraḥ pratyupasthito bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10171: evaṃ nimittamudgṛhyāpyeṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāmasmin kāye cāturmahābhūtike bījaṃ dhāturgotraṃ prakṛtirityadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:10180: ayaṃ) dhātuprabhedaprayuktasya cārthaprabhedaparyantaḥ rūpiṇāṃ tābaddhātūnāmākāśadhātoḥ punaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10181: yatpunarasya tasmin prayoge śamathavipaśyanābhāvanāyāṃ vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānamidamasya saṃprajanyasya smṛtisamatāyāśca [/
SA20srabhusu:10183: prasadanīyaṃ ca nimittaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavatīdamasyābhidhyādaurmanasya vinayasya,
SA20srabhusu:10192: tasya saiva sūkṣmā cittaikāgratā cittakāyapraśrabdhiścābhivara[ṃ] nī audārikāṃ sūpalakṣyāṃ cittaikāgratāṃ kāyapraśrabdhimāvahati /
SA20srabhusu:10218: tata ūrdhvamayaṃ yogī ādikarmikaḥ samanaskāro bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10221: rūpārthānurodhena samāhitabhūmiko manaskāraḥ parīttastaprathamataḥ pratilabdho bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10238: niṣaṇṇasya cāsya pratisaṃlayane cittaṃ pratidadhatastvaritatvaritaṃ cittaṃ praśrabhyate //
SA20srabhusu:10246: cānugatā bhavatītyevaṃ bhāgīyāni [sa]manaskārasya [ādikarmikasya] liṃgāni nimittānyavadātāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:10257: evaṃ parīttaprahāṇaratipraviṣṭasya tadūrdhvaṃ dve gatī bhavataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10269: yadā cāsya dṛṣṭisthiraḥ kharaśca manaskāraḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10273: tadā sa laukikena mārgeṇa gantukāmastatra ca prayogamārabhate lokottareṇa vā mārgeṇa [/]
SA20srabhusu:10284: ) amī catvāraḥ pudgalā dṛṣṭa eva dharme laukikamārgayāni(yi)
SA20srabhusu:10291: prathame ca dhyāne samāpattyupapattikleśāntatāṃ paśyatastatkāmavairāgyagamanamevaṃ yāvat /
SA20srabhusu:10346: te 'pi jātyādidharmatayā avinirmuktāstāvatkālikī sā teṣāṃ sampat /
SA20srabhusu:10371: anena paryāyeṇa kāmā vigarhitā buddhaiḥ buddhaśrāvakaiśca sadbhiḥ samyaggataiḥ,
SA20srabhusu:10374: nāsti cāsya kiṃcit pāpakamakuśalaṃ karmākaraṇīyaṃ vadāmi /
SA20srabhusu:10392: mārasyaiṣa nivāpo yatreme 'nekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā mānasāḥ saṃbhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:10396: ye vā punarāntarāyikā bhavantyāryaśrāvakasyāśikṣamāṇasyānekaparyāyeṇa kṛṣṇapakṣapatitā ete kāmā yadbhūyasā [/
SA20srabhusu:10407: mahatā pariśrameṇa vividhairvicitraiḥ śilpakarmasthānaiḥ kāmāḥ saṃhriyante /
SA20srabhusu:10414: asya vā punaḥ kāyasyādhyātmikasya rūpiṇa audārikasya cāturmahābhūtikasyaudanakalmāṣopacitasya nityotsadanasnapanapārimardanabhedana(c)
SA20srabhusu:10426: na saktena nānyatra vyādhigrastenaivātureṇa vyādhimātropaśamāya bhaiṣajyamāptāgamo 'pyeṣaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10435: sa evaṃ kāmānāmaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvejya yaduta ṣaḍbhirvastubhiḥ prathame dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati nāstyetatsarvaśa audārikatvaṃ (/
SA20srabhusu:10437: prathame ca dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇamayamucyate lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10440: sa evaṃ kāmānparijñāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yathāvatparyeṣṭau(ṣyau)
SA20srabhusu:10441: dārikaśāntalakṣaṇena śrutaṃ ca cintāṃ ca vyatikrāmyaikāntena bhāvanākāreṇaivādhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:10443: bhāvayaṃśca yathā yathā tāmaudārikaśāntatāṃ punaḥ punaradhimucyataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10448: kleśaprahāṇāya ca mārge samutpanne yastadbhagavato manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10460: tasya tathā prahāṇārāmasya bhāvanārāmasya samyakprayuktasya sataḥ kuśalapakṣaprayogopastambhakāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ kleśakarmaparyavasthānaṃ carato vā viharato vā na samudācarati /
SA20srabhusu:10465: tasyāprahīṇatvāt sarveṇa sarvamanuśayasya tannimittaṃ manasi kurvataḥ sevanānimnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10471: na me samyagviraktaṃ vimuktaṃ cittaṃ yaduta kāmebhyaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:10474: ) ya[n]nvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyānuśayasyāśeṣaprahāṇāya bhūyasyā mātrayā prahāṇārāmo vihareyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:10482: tasya pratipakṣaṃ ca bhāvayataḥ kālena kālaṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmānsamānasya sarvebhyaḥ kāmāvacarebhyaḥ kleśebhyaścittaṃ visaṃyujyate /
SA20srabhusu:10488: tasya ca samanaskārapratyayaṃ taddhetukaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:10492: ratisaṃgrāhake ca vivekajena prītisukhena kāyaṃ pratiprīṇayati /
SA20srabhusu:10494: kadācit kadācit dhyānavipulatarasaṃmukhībhāvena prayoganiṣṭhāphale punarmanaskāre vartamānasya nāsti kiñcidasyā(sya) bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10497: samaye viviktaiḥ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ paṃcā[ṅ]gamupasampadya viharati /
SA20srabhusu:10501: prahātavyasya ca prahāṇāya prāptavyasya ca prāptaye cittaṃ praṇidhatte /
SA20srabhusu:10502: ādhimokṣikeṇa ca manaskāreṇa prahāṇāya prāptaye ca samyak prayogamārabhate /
SA20srabhusu:10507: prayoganiṣṭhāphalenaiṣāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ bhāvitānāṃ subhāvitānāṃ bhāvanāphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10518: evaṃ sati ṣaṭṣu manaskāreṣu catvāro manaskārāḥ pravighnā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10528: avitarkaśca dvitīyadhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ sa lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10532: yaḥ samāhitabhūmiko 'pyugrālambanabhārī tatprathamopanipātitayā cālambane audāriko manojalpaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10547: uparimāṃ bhūmimārabhya duḥkhavihārānugatatvātkuṣṇapakṣyā kāmavivekaprītisukhamevānuśaṃsānugatā bhūmiścaiṣā tādṛśī prakṛtyā yatra sthitasya nityaṃ nityakālaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:10554: sarvaśo nāstyetadaudārikalakṣaṇamavitarkedvitīye dhyāne ityataḥ śāntaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamasyaudārikatvasyāpagamāt /
SA20srabhusu:10557: evaṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattaye yathāyogaṃ sapta manaskārā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10558: audārikalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvāsvadharimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanāt samāsena dvividhaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:10565: yasyā yasyā bhūmervairāgyaṃ karttukāmo bhavatyupariṣṭācca yathāyogaṃ śāntalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:10593: vyagracāriṇa ālambanādvivecya avyagracāriṇyālambane ekadharmatayā śāntaṃ prasannaṃ cittaṃ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:10598: tenāha cetasa ekotībhāvāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vitarkavicāraprahāṇādavitarkamavicāraṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ samādhistasyānantaraṃ taddhetukaṃ taṃtpra(kastatpra)
SA20srabhusu:10600: tenāha samādhijaṃ īpsitāninditārthaprāpteḥ prītau vā doṣadarśanāt /
SA20srabhusu:10602: prītisukhamanupūrveṇa gaṇayato dvitīyaṃ bhavatyevaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyam /
SA20srabhusu:10605: ] (Śbh_Sh 452) tasmiṃśca samaye dvividho 'sya cittakṣobhakaraḥ apakṣālo 'dhigato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10618: nāsti, tena tṛtīye dhyāne upekṣako viharatītyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:10621: yathā yathā te prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti /
SA20srabhusu:10622: sa cetpunarabhāvitatvāt tṛtīyasya dhyānasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣātkadācitkarhicit citte prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti /
SA20srabhusu:10631: tasya tasminsamaye evamupekṣakasya viharatā smṛtasya saṃprajanya syāsevanānvayādbahulīkārānvayātprītisahagataṃ prahīyate /
SA20srabhusu:10637: manaḥkāyena vedita sukhaṃ ca praśrabdhisukhaṃ pratisamvedayate /
SA20srabhusu:10639: adhastadrūpaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti nāpi nirantarā upekṣā tṛtīyā[d]dhyānādūrdhvaṃ yadapyupekṣopalabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:10642: idaṃ tadāyatanaṃ yaduta tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yattadāryā ācakṣate /
SA20srabhusu:10644: sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharatīti āryāḥ punaḥ vṛddhāśca vṛddhaśrāvakāśca /
SA20srabhusu:10654: tatra caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle tasmin samaye sa dhyāyī sukhaduḥkhavyatikramamanuprāpnoti /
SA20srabhusu:10662: tanna caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle sukhasya ca prahāṇāaddvitīyadhyānasamāpattikāle duḥkhasya,
SA20srabhusu:10669: aduḥkhāsukhā tasmin samaye prathamaṃ dhyānamupādāya sarve adhobhūmikāḥ apakṣālāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:10681: tatrākāśādhimokṣasya varṇasaṃjñā nīlapītalohitāvadātādipratisaṃyuktatāmasātāmasātayā nirvirāgatayā ca samatikrānto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10684: samatikramādanābhāsagamanahetoryā anekavidhā bahunānāprakārā varṇapracayahetukā āvaraṇasaṃjñā sā (yā)
SA20srabhusu:10688: tāsāmvā punarvigamahetoryā aupacayikīsaṃjñāsteṣvavaśiṣṭeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu saṃghāteṣu pravṛttāstadyathā bhojanapānavastrālaṃkāragṛhodyānavanasenāparvatādisaṃjñā[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:10692: sa evaṃ rūpapratighanānātvasaṃjñā bhāvayitvā anantākāreṇākāśādhimukto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10699: tasyākāśamālambanaṃ samāpannasya punastacca tadanye ca skandhāḥ svabhūmikāḥ sāmantake punaradhobhūmikā api skandhāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10712: sa vijñānānantyāyatanāduccalito vijñānāt pareṇālambanaṃ samanveṣamāṇo na punarlabhate (/
SA20srabhusu:10713: ) kiñcana pratisaṃyuktaṃ rūpi vā, arūpi vā [/
SA20srabhusu:10714: ] sa tadālambanamalabhamānaḥ sasāmāntakamaulaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ [sa]matikramya nāsti kiñcidanyadā lambanamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:10716: sa tasya saṃjñādhimokṣasya bahulīkārānvayādākiṃcanyāyatanasāmantakaṃ samatikramya yāvatprayoganiṣṭhā(n)
SA20srabhusu:10729: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sāsya saṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10732: nānyatra sūkṣmā sā saṃjñā nimittālambane pravartate /
SA20srabhusu:10734_0: ] evaṃ tadāyatanādhimuktaḥ sasāmantakamaulamākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasāmantakasya
SA20srabhusu:10736: sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatana[ṃ] samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasampadya viharatīti //
SA20srabhusu:10743: (Śbh_Sh 459) tatrāsaṃjñāsamāpatti[ṃ] saṃjñāvimukhena manaskāreṇa pṛthagjana eva samāpadyate,
SA20srabhusu:10745: tatra dvābhyāṃ manaskārābhyāmanayoḥ samāpattyoḥ samāpattipraveśo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10756: samanaskārasamāpannasya ca punaścittaṃ na pravartata iti /
SA20srabhusu:10757: sa evaṃ niḥsaraṇasaṃjñā pūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa śubhakṛtyavītarāgasya,
SA20srabhusu:10762: tatra naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalābhī āryaḥ pareṇa śāntena vihāreṇa viharttukāmaḥ naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāccittamuccā layati /
SA20srabhusu:10766_0: ya evamākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śaikṣasyārhato vā vihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa
SA20srabhusu:10766_1: cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodha iyamucyate nirodhasamāpattirevaṃ ca punarasyāḥ prāptirbhavati //
SA20srabhusu:10775: pūrvenivāsadivyaśrotracyutyupapādacetaḥ paryāyamvā tameva manasi kurvan samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇārthapratisaṃvedī ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10780: sa kālo bhavati samayo yadasya bhāja(va)
SA20srabhusu:10796: ] vāyumaṇḍalake vā sa tathā [a]dhimucyamānaḥ tatra prerayatyādhimokṣikeṇaiva manaskāreṇa [/
SA20srabhusu:10805: tatrākāśadhātusaṃjñā yayā saṃjñayā laghutāṃ ca mṛdutāṃ cātmano 'dhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:10807: tatra yadantarālaṃ vivandhacaraṃ rūpigataṃ gamanāya tadākāśamadhimucyate [/
SA20srabhusu:10811: tatra cittakāyasamavadhānasaṃjñā yayā cittamvā kāye samavadadhāti /
SA20srabhusu:10828: ityābhiḥ pañcasaṃjñābhiḥ bhāvanāyā pariniṣpannābhiranekavidhamṛddhiṣayaṃ pratyanubhavatyeko bhūtvā bahudhātmānamupadarśayati /
SA20srabhusu:10841: imau vā sūryācandramasāvevaṃ mahardhikau mahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi /
SA20srabhusu:10851: tatra pūrvānubhūtacaritānukramānusmṛtisaṃjñā yayā kumārakabhāvamupādāya yatrāsya smṛtiḥ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:10857: śayito vistareṇa sarvāṃ pūrvānubhūtāṃ caryāmaudāraudārikaudārikatayā anuparivāṭikayā avyutkramanti(nte) /
SA20srabhusu:10859: tasyā bhāvanānvayād bhāvanāphalamanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati yāvatsansā(saṃsā)
SA20srabhusu:10868: nānāprakārasya janakāyasya sanniṣaṇṇasya sannipatitasya yo vyatimiśro,
SA20srabhusu:10873: tatra nimittamudgṛhya yā saṃjñābhāvanā yayā samāhitabhūmikena manasikāreṇāryānāryeṣu śabdeṣu,
SA20srabhusu:10876: tasyāsya bahulīkārānvayād bhāvanāphalaṃ divyaṃ śrotraṃ pratilabhate /
SA20srabhusu:10884: yena divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena vistareṇa yāvatkāyasya bhedātsvargatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante(te) /
SA20srabhusu:10905: yena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ vitarkitaṃ vicāritaṃ mano manasā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20srabhusu:10919: anāryayā na punarna tathaiva bhavatyapi tu /
SA20srabhusu:10921: evamābhirdvādaśabhiḥ saṃjñābhirbahulīkārānvayādyathāyogaṃ sa pañcānāmabhijñānāmāryāṇāṃ ca guṇānāmapṛthagjanasandhāraṇānāṃ yathāyogamabhinirhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:10922: tatra prathame dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitena yathāyogaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:10925: ] dvitīye dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhāvite yathāyogaṃ parīttānāmābhāsvarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupasaṃpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:10932: sa cetpunaranāgāmī anāsraveṇa dhyānena caturthena sāsravaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:10964: ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni vītarāgaliṃgāni veditavyānītyayaṃ tāvat laukikamārgagamanasya vibhāgaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:10965: atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa gantukāmo bhavati tasya catvāryāryasatyānyārabhya sapta manaskārā anupūrveṇotpadyante /
SA20srabhusu:11003: ] te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ samāsataḥ sattvalokaśca bhājanalokaśca //
SA20srabhusu:11008: vistareṇa yāvat kāsasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /
SA20srabhusu:11009: ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa bhagavatā cakṣuṣmatā pratyakṣadarśinā sattvalokasyānityatā vyākhyātā /
SA20srabhusu:11013: sa samayo yaddīrghasyādhvano 'tyayādanupūrveṇa yāvatsaptānāṃ sūryāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11015: yāvadasyāḥ khalu mahāpṛthivyāḥ sumerośca parvata rājasya /
SA20srabhusu:11016: yāvacca brahmalokād bhājanalokasya dagdhasya dhmātasya maṣirapi na prajñāyate /
SA20srabhusu:11020: tāvadāptāgamaṃ niśrityāyaṃ yogī śraddhādhipateyaṃ sarvasaṃskārānityatāyāṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhate //
SA20srabhusu:11032: bāhyamvastu (sa evaṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya śraddhādhipatyena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣatāmaviparokṣatāmaparapratyayatā(ṃ)
SA20srabhusu:11078: tatra kālaparivāso nāma yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ rūpiṇāṃ svasthāne 'pyupanyastakānāṃ kālāntareṇa jarjarato palabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:11080: tatra paropakramo nāma yathāpi tat paro vividhāni rūpāṇi vividhaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ vividhairupakramaviśeṣaiḥ vicitrāṃ vikṛtimāpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:11081: tatropabhogo nāma yathāpi tatpratisvāmino vividhaṃ rūpamupabhuṃjānā upabhogavidhipatitvā (gamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā vi)
SA20srabhusu:11083: tatra ṛtuvipariṇāmo nāma tadyathā hemante tṛṇauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:11091: tatrāgnidāho nāma yathāpi tadagnirmukto grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīrdahan paraiti /
SA20srabhusu:11092: tatrodakakledo nāma tathāpi tanmahān udakaskandhaḥ samudāgato (grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṃ dahan paraiti /
SA20srabhusu:11096: tatra vāyuśoṣo nāma tathāpi tanmahatā vāyuskandhenārdrāḥ pṛthivīpradeśā laghu laghveva śuṣyanti /
SA20srabhusu:11098: pratyayāntarasamudgamo nāma tadyathā sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītya sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasya sukhavedanīya(ḥ)
SA20srabhusu:11102: sparśasamudgamaḥ] aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasyāsukhavedanīyasya vāduḥkhavedanīyasya vā sparśasya samudgamaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11103: tathā raktasya pratighanimittasamudgamaḥ yasya samudgamādrāgaparyavasthānaṃ ca vigacchati /
SA20srabhusu:11117: ihānecā(nā)tmano [vā] pareṣāmvā dahrāvasthāmupādāya yāvajjīrṇāvasthā dṛṣṭā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11123: me saṃskārā[s] tathāpyeṣāṃ pratyakṣata eveyaṃ pūrvaṇāparā vikṛtirupalabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:11133: paścācca durvarṇatāṃ duśchavitāṃ rukṣatāṃ rukṣavarṇatāṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:11135: ] dṛṣṭvā ca punareva pratyudāvarttyāpareṇa samayena tāmeva suvarṇatāṃ paryavadātatvagvarṇatāṃ ca paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11140: yathā varṇa ukta evaṃ kṛśasthūlatayā saṃsthānaṃ veditavyaṃ sampattirvipattiśca /
SA20srabhusu:11170: tasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:11172: evamātmano vā pareṣāmvā paropakrameṇa kāyavikṛtiṃ paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11177: ] apareṇa vā punaḥ samayena tāṃ vikṛtiṃ na paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11188: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyudāvarttya punaḥ śītakāle pūrvoktairevākāraiḥ paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11191: me saṃskārā iti pūrvavadeva[ṃ] śītakṛtāṃ vipariṇāmānityatāṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:11200: sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpannāṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11204: ] tasya pūrvāṃ paryeṣaṇā āsāṃ vedanānāṃ navanavatāniḥpurāṇa purāṇatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupāsthāyitamanyathībhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
SA20srabhusu:11210: samohaṃ vigatamohamanyatamānyatamena vā upakleśenopakliṣṭaṃ cittamupakliṣṭamiti parijānāti /
SA20srabhusu:11213: rvāparyeṇaibhiḥ kleśopakleśairavatīparṇavipariṇatāvipariṇatāṃcittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti /
SA20srabhusu:11248: vijñānaśūnyaṃ kalevaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pūrvavat //
SA20srabhusu:11253: ekadā vipūyakāvasthamenaṃ vistareṇa yāvasthiśaṃkalikāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvāsyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bata(te)
SA20srabhusu:11263: me saṃskārāstathā hyeṣāṃ paurvāparyeṇa pratyakṣata evāyamevaṃ rūpo vikāra upalabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:11265: evaṃ tāvatpratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇādhyātmikasya vastunaḥ [paṃca] daśabhirākārairvipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20srabhusu:11268: ye 'nena pṛthivīpradeśā nābhisaṃskṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:11273: titapatitān khalu chidrānagninā vā dagdhānudakena vāpahratāṃ(hṛtān) /
SA20srabhusu:11281: evaṃ tṛṇauṣadhivanaspataya ārāmodyānāni ca samṛddhapatrapuṣpaphalāni paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11287: tathā parvatānyekadā samṛddhapāṣāṇāni paśyatyekadā nirluṭhitapāṣāṇāni patita śrṛṃgāṇi,
SA20srabhusu:11294: sarveṇa vā sarvaṃ viśuṣkāṇi khilībhūtāni koṭarāṇi /
SA20srabhusu:11298: tathā kośasannidhīnāṃ vicitrāṇāṃ nānāprakārāṇāmekadā ācayaṃ paśyatyekadā apacayaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11301: (Śbh_Sh 484) tathā vividhāni yānānyekadā sumaṇḍitāni svalaṃkṛtānyabhinavāni paśyatyekadā vigatālaṃkārāṇi /
SA20srabhusu:11320: ebhiraṣṭābhirvipariṇāmakāraṇaiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairasyādhyātmikabāhyasya vastuno yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇaivaṃ vipariṇāmākāreṇānityatāṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20srabhusu:11321: (Śbh_Sh 485) yathānena sā vipariṇāmānityatā pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavatyanubhūtā,
SA20srabhusu:11326: sa evaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇa vipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavahā(cā)
SA20srabhusu:11328: yeṣāṃ rūpiṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ satī samvidyamānā kṣaṇotpannabhagnā vinīlatā(vilīnatā)
SA20srabhusu:11330: tatra pratyakṣādhipateyaṃ manaskāraṃ niśrityānumānaṃ karotyevañca punaranumānaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:11333: iti hi kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāsteṣu teṣu pratyayeṣu satsu tathā tathotpadyante /
SA20srabhusu:11340: ] sahaiva tena vināśakāraṇena vinaṣṭānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ yasmādvisadṛśā (śī)
SA20srabhusu:11344: tadyathā kvāthyamānāmasāmante sarveṇa sarvamparikṣayo bhavati agninirdagdhānāṃ ca lokabhājanānāṃ masirapi na [pra]jñāyate /
SA20srabhusu:11346: śiṣṭamapi na prajñāyate teṣāmapyuttarottarakaraṇaparyādānādante sarveṇa sarvamabhāvo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11348: ] tasmādvipariṇāmakāraṇānyetānyaṣṭau yathoktāni svarasenaiva tu vināśo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11349: sa evamānumānikamanaskāreṇa saṃskāreṇākṣaṇotpannabhagnavilīnatāyāṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya punarapyapratyakṣaparalokāsaṃskārapravṛttāvanumānaṃ karoti //
SA20srabhusu:11370: sa cedīśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ syāttadīśvarapratyayameva vā syādanyena vopādāneneśvaro nirmimīta /
SA20srabhusu:11371: sa cedīśvara pratyayameva syāt teneśvarasyaiṣāñca saṃskārāṇāṃ yaugapadyaṃ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:11378: ] yadi sahetukā īśvarahetukaiva ca tena pūrvakeṇa doṣeṇa tulyatayā na yujyate /
SA20srabhusu:11381: (Śbh_Sh 488) praṇidhānamīśvaravinirmuktānyadharmahetukā tathā sarve 'pi saṃskārā dharmahetukā eva bhaviṣyanti /
SA20srabhusu:11386: tatra yā pūrva pañca [vidhā]nityatā pañcākārabhāvanānugatā uddiṣṭā,
SA20srabhusu:11395: so 'pareṇa samayena svāmibhāvamadāsabhāvaṃ vihāya pareṣāṃ dāsabhāvamupagacchati /
SA20srabhusu:11405: 'dhvani bhāvinyā dharmatāṃ pratividhyatyevaṃ dharmāṇa ete saṃskārā anāgate 'dhvani evaṃbhāgīyā iti /
SA20srabhusu:11410: sa evamādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pañcavidhāyāmanityatāyāmebhiḥ pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ manasikārabāhulyādupapattisādhanabhāvanādhipatyācca niye(rme)
SA20srabhusu:11415: iti hyeta eva saṃskārā jātidharmāṇaḥ jātiśca duḥkhā, yadā(yā)
SA20srabhusu:11430: tathā hyaduḥkhāsukhāsthānīyāḥ skandhāḥ sopādānā dauṣṭhulyasahagatā abījānugatā avinirmuktā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā,
SA20srabhusu:11435: yaduta saṃyojanabandhanākāreṇa duḥkhavedanāsthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣuduḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāmavatīrṇo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11440_0: saṃyojanabandhanākāramaniṣṭākāraṃ yogakṣemākāraṃ cādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tisṛṣu vedanāsu
SA20srabhusu:11481: yasya prahāṇādasya duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ syādityebhiścaturbhirākāraissamudayasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /
SA20srabhusu:11488: upādānahetukasya ca bhavasya samudāgamādbhavapūrvikāyā jāteḥ prabhavatvāt,
SA20srabhusu:11497: ] yaḥ kleśānuśaya āśraya[ḥ] punarbhavāmabhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ veditavyaṃ [/
SA20srabhusu:11500: sa āyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ samudayaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:11505: prabhavo bhavati sā punarnandīrāgasahagatā tṛṣṇā prabhūtā,
SA20srabhusu:11506: tatra tatrābhinandinyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayo bhavatyevamasyānuśayagatāṃ trividhaparyavasthāgatāṃ ca tṛṣṇāmāgamyāyati[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:11513: samudayasatyalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedya asya samudayasatyasyāśeṣoparamannirodhaṃ nirodhata ākārayati /
SA20srabhusu:11534: yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvatra sarvaśaḥ [evaṃ tadevaṃ pratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11537: te 'pyevaṃ dharmāṇaste 'pyevaṃ nayapatitā iti yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvatra sarvaśa] evaṃ tadevaṃprakṛtikaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:11540: nairyāṇiko yastatprahāṇāya tasya yadā vipakṣokteṣu pratyātmikeṣu skandheṣu satyajñānaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11543: sa cāyaṃ lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ śrutacintāvyavakīrṇo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11544: yadā teṣu satyeṣvayaṃ yogī evaṃ samyak(g)
SA20srabhusu:11548: tadā śrutacintāmayaṃ manaskāraṃ samatikramya vyavatīrṇavarttinamekāntena bhāvanākāreṇādhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:11603: ānimittamānimittataḥ paśyāmi mamaite dharmāstaddhetostatpratyayasya taccittaṃ na praskandatyā(tya)
SA20srabhusu:11607: raṃ vibandhakāra iti laghu laghveva prajñayā pratividhya,
SA20srabhusu:11614: sa utpannotpannaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyamānamanantarotpannena cittena bhajyamānaṃ paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11620_0: tathā prayukto 'yaṃ yogī yattasyāścittasantateḥ anyonyatāṃ navanavatāmāpāyikatāṃ
SA20srabhusu:11629: ] asyā api cittasanteteryo nirodhaḥ so 'pi śāntaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11631: sa nairyāṇika ityevamaparīkṣitamanaskāraparīkṣāyogena sūkṣmayā prajñayā na tānyāryasatyānyavatīrṇo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11643: sa evambibandhakaramasmimānaṃ prahāya nirvāṇe cādhyāśayaratiṃ parigṛhyayo 'sāvuttarottaraścittaparikṣayābhisaṃskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11645: tasya taccittaṃ tasmin samaye niruddhamiva khyāti /
SA20srabhusu:11658: tasya tatsarvapaścimanirvikalpaṃcittaṃ yasyānantaraṃ pūrvavicāriteṣu satveṣvadhyātmamābhogaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:11668: tasyotpādāt traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ pakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyasanniśrayasanniviṣṭaṃ tatprahīyate /
SA20srabhusu:11669: tasya prahāṇāt sacetpūrvameva kāmebhyo vītarāgo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11681: sa bhūyassa tasya dauṣṭhulyasya pratipraśrabdheḥ srota āpanno bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11688: tasyemāni liṃgāni catvāri jñānānyanena pratilabdhāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:11718: tasya yāvallaukikebhyo 'gradharmebhya adhimokṣiko manaskāraḥ satyānyabhisamitavataḥ darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu prāvivekyo manaskāraḥ,
SA20srabhusu:11721: ata ūrdhvaṃ yathāpratilabdhaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayato 'bhyasyataḥ kāmāvacarāṇāmadhimātramadhyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt sakṛdāgāmī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11724: ayañca viśeṣo yadviṣaye 'dharakleśasthānīyeṣu adhimātraparyavasthānīye 'pi baddhaṃ kleśaparyavasthānamutpādayatyāśu cāpanayati /
SA20srabhusu:11727: anāgāmiliṃgāni ca pūrvoktānītyeva tatra sarvo bhāvanāmārgaḥ pratyavekṣya pratyavekṣya mīmānsā(māṃsa)
SA20srabhusu:11732: yaḥ samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇa laukikalokottareṇaiṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11741: tatra ye tāvadapratilabdhā dharmāḥ kuśalā vaiśeṣikāstān pratilabhate /
SA20srabhusu:11769: tathā tathā adhobhūmikāḥ prahāṇādharmā dūrī bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:11784: tatra lokottaramārgabhāvanā duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvataḥ,
SA20srabhusu:11788: tatra madhyamārgabhāvanā yayā madhyān kleśān prajahāti /
SA20srabhusu:11791: tatra prayogamārgabhāvanā yayā prayogamārabhate kleśa prahāṇāya /
SA20srabhusu:11793: (Śbh_Sh 506) tatra vimuktimārgabhāvanā yayā samanantaraprahīṇe kleśavimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA20srabhusu:11798: tasyaivaṃ bhāvanāprayuktasya kālena ca kālaṃ kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmānsa(māṃsa)
SA20srabhusu:11800: kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayataḥ,
SA20srabhusu:11802: tasyāsya ratisaṃgrāhakasya manaskārasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayānniravaśeṣabhāvanāprahātavyā[ḥ] kleśaprahāṇāya sarvapaścimaḥ śaikṣo vajropamaḥ samādhirutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:11813: tasya vajropamasya samādheḥ samanantaraṃ sarvakleśapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyabījasamuddhātādatyantatāyai cittamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:11822: aśaikṣayā samyagdṛṣṭyā samyaksaṃkalpena yāvadaśaikṣayā samyagvimuktyā samyagjñānena [/
SA20srabhusu:11830: yaṃ yamevākāṃkṣate dharmaṃ manasi karttuṃ kuśalamarthopasaṃhitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11845: kta cittaḥ, suvimuktaprajñaḥ kevalo ukṣi..........cca...........li puruṣa ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:11848: bhavati suṣṭhumanāḥ upekṣako bhavati smṛtaḥ samprajā[nā]naḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11859: samacittaśca bhavati vāsī candanakalpaḥ sendro pitryāṇāṃ devānāṃ mānyaśca pūjyaśca mārgakāśeṣadhātupratiṣṭhite ca bhavati tīrṇaḥ pāragato 'ntimādehadhārītyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:11860: pūrvakarmakleśāviddhānāṃ pañca skandhānāṃ svarasaṃ..........nānu pādānāt vā,
SA20srabhusu:11864: nānyatra yad duḥkhaṃ tanniruddhaṃ tavyupaśāntaṃ tacchītībhūtaṃ bhava iṃ gataṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11866: yaduta sarvopadhipratiniḥsarvasaṃjñākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇaṃ tasyemāni liṃgānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:11870: prāpayituṃ mandadā tra ma brahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣevituṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11873: tathā bhavyaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyetuṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11876_1: prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ yaḥ punaragraphalārhattvasaṃgṛhītamanaskāro 'yaṃ prayoganiṣṭhāphalo manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11880: mo dha ka sarveṣāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃyuktānāṃ nirdeśasthānīyānāṃ sākṣātkā[ra]sthānīyānāṃ tadyathā sarvanāmakāyapadakāyavyaṃjanakāyakāvyamanu śāstrāṇi // mātṛkā //
